name: Lomesh Dorle
title: Worth.  ..Must Buy
content: Excellent as described in the discription..... Sound is Great........Best for the Gift...... It's reduce the surrounding noise and give a clear sound experience......... I will recommend to all must buy this for Great sounds experience

name: Vijay B
title: Best choice for budget earphones.
content: Excellent budget earphones. Boat is leading the fight for the low budget, high quality earphones. Decent bass and good clarity. These types of earphones are spoiling us for choice since now u ou can get great audio for such a cheap price.. IMO these are better than mi basic.

name: Jakir husain
title: Bad products üò±üò±üò±üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò¢üò¢üôÖüôÖüôÖüôèüôèüôèüôèüôè
content: Very bad products don't buy please very bad products is this Very bad products don't buy please very bad products is this Very bad products don't buy please very bad products is this Very bad products don't buy please very bad products is this Very bad products don't buy please very bad products is this Very bad products don't buy please very bad products is this

name: Snehal
title: Great quality at the offered price range.
content: The sound quality and the appearance is definitely very good for the price the headphones are offered. However I had to replace the headphones when after using for 2 days,left earpiece started giving problems. Got the replacement within 20 hours now I'm hoping it works well in coming days and in long run.

name: Manoj Prabhakar
title: Good Earphones.. Worth the buy...
content: I m very much satisfied with this amazing product.. Its durability is amazing.. I have been using this for past 1 yr and it still giving the same quality which i got on 1st day.. At this price range, one of the amazing earphones. I will not say that it has the best sound quality but it can definitely compete the headphones in the range of 1000rs..After 1 year of hard usage, i m not even seeing single damages in the wire and mic.. That is what we call as Durability.... Keep Rocking Boat....

name: Anupam Patra
title: Every Cloud has a Silver Lining.
content: The button provided for receiving calls, playing the next/previous song, pausing the music doesn't work properly except for the feature of receiving and disconnecting the call. One cannot play/pause song by the help of the button.. The Mic provided in the Earphone is of Poor Quality. The sensitivity to sound is low, for which one cannot converse with someone over the call by the help of the microphone. If one has to ever converse with anyone, then he/she has to hold the microphone near to his/her mouth and then speak up.. The durability,and sound quality is good, if one views that from the perspective of the cost price of the earphone. The Earbuds attached to the bent framework of earphone is Superb. And the Earphone happens to perfectly fit into anybody's ear irrespective of the structure and shape of the Ear Pinna.. The moderate sound from the surroundings can't be heard while you have put on the Earphones with volume raised to forty percent even. Therefore, it feels Good when You put on these Earphones. But just the disappointment of not being able to play /pause the song anytime would hinder the love for the Product.

name: anmol kumar
title: Pros : 20% Cons : 80%
content: The earphones seem defective. I have two pairs of these boat bass head earphones. Both are equally dysfunctional....IDK this is inherent with this type....or...im unfortunate.. Though bass is up to the mark...and it gives a quality audio quality for music and videos. But fails pathetically when it comes to talking over phone....and IDK how can it be fixed

name: nikita nair
title: Absolute value for money.
content: Shockingly good. I've owned branded ones hoping that their wires would be better and the sound wouldn't go off in one ear after a month or two. Then i bought this (was recommended to me) and I loved it. It's almost been a year since then...using it as i write this. Contemplating buying the Bluetooth one now.

name: Nilesh
title: mast
content: must by earpiece but there is a problem in adjustment while walking or doing some task. these earpieces are not comfortable that much.. serval times came out n due to this it will hectic things to adjust.

name: pravinkumar D Kurade
title: Low bass. Average built quality.
content: Received yesterday built quality average . Bass really low. No return policy by amazon.. For calling its good.. Still boat need to improve quality of buds and wire.. If can pay 1500 rs then go for sony XB 55.

name: srinidhi
title: Disappointed!
content: I was so looking forward to receive this product. I kinda liked it at first tho the wire was cut a little bit. The problem started 1 month later. Suddenly the tap button was pressed inside and I couldn't watch a video in peace cos of the disturbances it gave. I tried calling for a complaint but couldn't reach. Now in 5 months everything is worn out and I can hear from only one side of the earphone the left one isn't working at all. Totally disappointedüëé

name: Musawwar
title: Durable, Top Quality Sound and Economical
content: I am writing this review after 4months of regular usage. Its has really lived upto its performance on all spheres. Good Sound Quality and build to last. No second thought, if you are looking for an economical wired headfone... Just Go for THIS!!... You'll end up making one of the best decision of your life. üëç

name: hi everyone
title: Awesome product.. Must buy‚úå‚úå
content: The sound quality of the earphones is awesome..üòÑ U just feel that u're hearing the music through a home theatre.. It actually does its work of noise cancellation perfectly.. I dont have any idea on the durability as i've used it just for a week.. I luv it so much.. Fashion lovers seriously i recommend u 2 buy this.. Awesome product and value for money.. The most impressive thing is i love the hawk like design.. It attracted and impressed me a lot..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Beautiful Product.
content: Value for your money. If you got no dogs (unfortunately my dobie chewed mine haha) and can keep it safe, it's an amazing product. Comes with extra small & large silicone heads, which you can adjust according to your need.. Bass is quite good. Played couple of pubg matches too, footstep clarity was beautiful.

name: Pradeep Kumar K
title: Price worthy!! Best quality!! Quick delivery!!
content: Worth for money... Never thought I would get such a headset for just ‚Çπ349. I booked @3:30 pm on 6th oct and received the product in hand @9:40 am on 7th oct, Thanks to Amazon Prime.. Pros:. *Best sound quality in this price. *wear comfort. *lengthy wire. *noise cancellation. *quick delivery. Cons:. *Bass could be better... But still this is the best in this price ;) not actually a prob.

name: Reese Sam
title: Good Product, last for about 12-18 months
content: Had bought in October 2019, left ear stopped working in Feb 2021 the other ear stopped soon after.. The wires are pretty delicate so had to handle it with care. Enjoyed while it lasted.

name: Divesh Agarwal
title: The boat with Bass (BWB)
content: The overall product is excellent. It perfectly sits in the ear. You can rely on the quality as the boat company provides bass and perfect sound quality. Perfectly for LOW BUDGET!

name: Priyansh
title: An average product, try your luck with other earphones.
content: I have used this for one month now...I used amazon basics before this one for 1.5 years. They had fad far better sound as well as bass quality than this one...Boat has got more middle frequency and sounds fat. The design looks appealing but I am not satisfied with the sound. For wire, there is no damage till now but I am pretty suspicious for how long would it last. The length is just a bit small for me. Also the buds did not fit my ear correctly. I am using the old ones from my previous earphones and they are very comfortable for me.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average bass but clear sound
content: Hello guys, from last few months I was in search of a good earphones and finally my search ends here. Few observations. 1. It lack greatly in deep and dynamic surrounding bass. Guys trust me if you are punching, deep bass lover then it's a big disappointment for you. pls don't go for it. 2. Rest sound is crystal clear and each details can be easily noticeable.. 3. Noise cancellation does it's job nicely.. 4. For me it's a big disappointment in bass department.

name: Aj
title: Don't Act like a fool!
content: Do you really expect that you would get quality earphones for a price less than 400!.. Let's start with built-the worst thing about it. I mean even the plastic coating is cheap and just for show!.. The sound quality is not at all something to discuss. It's average.. Overall please dont buy these and instead spend a few more bucks and get better earphones

name: Indumathi
title: Not as great as the brand name goes
content: Gone by the brand name, I purchased this one. But, hasn't met the expectation. Ears stats paining if i keep the ear plugged for 30+ min. No noise cancellation. The receiver can hear the surround sound better than what I speak. I wouldn't recommend this one.

name: Ankit S.
title: Good quality
content: Boat is trustworthy brand in mobile accessories. I have ordered and using the earphones and micro usb cable of other brands and boat as well. It has a good sound quality if you want me to rate the sound quality.. Sound quality : 4/5. Bass : 5/5. This is worthful product and brand .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor product, poor customer service
content: This product is cheap and offers quality for the price. But the ear pieces stopped working after 3 months of use. Though they have 1 year warranty, the website to claim warranty is not working. No one replies to your email and no one picks up your call. Why do these companies invests loads of money on marketing rather than building a good product and having a good customer service. I'll never order again and never recommend this brand.

name: Simpal
title: Great
content: Each and every thing is good about the earphone. Only the mic could have been better. It does not cath vouce when you left it free hanging around your neck. You have to take the mic very near to mouth

name: Arup Mitra
title: Excellent Choice - As per first time boAt user
content: Build quality (5/5). Durability (4/5) - Earphone wire could have more better quality. Wire length and tangle free(5/5). Sound quality (5/5). Microphone (5/5). Ear comfort (5/5). Excellent sound quality. If you are using it with phone for music, enable equalizer or better to create a custom equalizer as per you requirement and adaptability. Overall good performance

name: Kaustav Dasgupta
title: Listen to me
content: I have gifted to my elder sister. Writing on her behalf.. Product colour is real cool, and mostly a small velcro material has been provided to keep the wire tangle free whlie not in use.

name: SUCHISMITA NAYAK
title: Torn within two months
content: The quality is satisfactory for phone calls, but even after careful usage, one string has torn within 2 months. It is not suitable for high-quality music listening and noise cancellation.

name: Shifa Sheikh
title: Good customer service by boat!!
content: Okay! I got defective piece. Because it started to sound disoriented after 20 days of use. I have filed complaint on boat website. They have pick up my earphones now I'm waiting for my replaced earphones!!

name: Naresh Kohli
title: Amazing earbuds but pathetic mic
content: The sound quality of the earbuds is amazing. The bass is also powerful, though its not as much as bassheads 225 but still, its lot better than others.. The only drawback is that the quality of mic is so pathetic. I records sound like old sound recorders. Not able to record sound clearly.

name: Chinmay
title: More than pathetic
content: The after sale service is more then worst. It last for few months if you use carefully. But once it stops working there is no use of warranty. You can do what ever you want but can't get repaired or replaced. Nor the company bothers about you. It's better to buy same range product from any other manufacturers. You will always get scripted reply on all channels.

name: Rishank ratan
title: Sound Quality sucks on low notes.
content: Just got this product today.. m writing this review after using this earphone continuously for the past 4 hours on Samsung J7 Prime.. Redmi Note 8 pro and Xolo 4x.. This earphone sucks at low notes. M not at all happy with its sound quality on low notes. The quality of sound goes blande.. But the bass is awesome. This earphone just offers great base and nothing else. I will be returning this product and will go for a JBL earphones.

name: ARNAB KONAR
title: Elegant earphone
content: At this price I would seriously be recommending to go for this earphone. It has got everything in it right from externally built quality and scope of entanglement is very less. And it gives the required amount or to be specific abit more appropriate sound quality though the bass quality could have been better. But at this price this is the best and apt, one should go for it

name: Sandeep kumar tripathi
title: One of the best
content: Yes this earphones is the best earphones I used ever because of its bass and you all know the company boat its all earphone comes with a very good audio. But i noticed when I listen at a higher volumes it's pitch it's too hard so I recommend to listen at medium volumes can you feel the difference thanks for reading

name: Rehan
title: Good
content: Ordered this for my niece and she absolutely loves it, mainly because of the colour (pink). Asked her for the feedback and she says it works like a charm so im giving this review on her behalf.

name: RJ
title: Extremely Poor PProduct Quality
content: I've purchased a boat headset in last October and after 6 months it got damaged. Few months ago, one side hear bud got damaged and no sound is coming. And after a week both got damaged and headset is waste. Very sorry to say that, what type of quality they are maintaining. Where I can file the complaint. What is next?

name: Mandar
title: Good quality, good price.
content: I use them primarily for phone calls & only occasionally for music. Clear sound- check, good mic- check, and a snug fit in the ears- check.. Quite happy with the product, especially for the price.

name: Nuthan
title: Facing issue while video calls
content: I bought this product I may.. Actually I use to talk with ear phones. I am proud to be say that I bought same product in last 2 years with different colors. Boat eat phone is the best and worthy product in Amazon.. But I am very disappoint with present product.. I am feeling okay with offline calls.. When I use online calls like video calls or zoom calls the sounds was like hell. Too horrible sound I was getting from it. If possible could you replace my product.

name: geetika
title: Best earphones in this price range
content: I am very happy from my boAt bass head 100. The sound quality is amazing for the price at which they are offered. Bass quality is also good. Bass is just right and sounds awesome. Not too much nor less. Noise cancelling is so so.. Over all 4.5/5

name: Jp
title: Don't Buy. Almost all BOAT earphones are not compatible to 90% of devices.
content: I have used this earphone with many different devices. But, it is not compatible with almost 90% of device. Totally useless. No noise cancellation. No Proper Base(even named BASSHEAD). Sound Quality decent. But can't here in noisy area as noise cancellation is very bad. Recommend to buy BOULT company earphone in same range they are I can say 200% more valuable than this.. Thanks.

name: Navee krishnaa
title: waste
content: read this fully. the waste product I had seen don't buy this. waste product. waste of money and it is useless. you can buy a bit costlier product rather than buying this. bad quality. disappointed

name: Om patil
title: Lightweight and easy to recommend
content: Good earphones but the ipl version just have a small logo which doesnt justify paying 100 ruppes extra. Apart from that they have balanced sounds quality and a very lightweight design

name: Darshit
title: Good for this price range.
content: Good for this price range. Build quality is tough too. Surely best than other chip type earphones we buy for 100/150Rs. Ofcourse CANNOT be compared with Apple‚Äôs wired earphones or any big headphones. I am using BoatRoker 400 and I like them very much than any other.

name: Amol Mehetre
title: Value for money. Just go for it.
content: Pros:. 1) Very good sound quality.. 2) Good noise cancellation.. 3) Comfortable even after long hours of listening.. 4) Design and build quality is great. I personlly don't like metallic built earphones, they're kind of uncomfortable to the ears and heavy.. 5) Good wire- tangle free and comes with appropriate length.. 6) A good buy at this price.. Cons:. 1) For being a bassheads model, not too much bass, but can be improved from equalizer settings.. 2) Earphone jack is straight.

name: anushka
title: Terrible,Highly not recommended
content: I would like to give it 0 stars but there was not an option for that so have to give it one star. Highly not recommended !! Poor sound quality is not just the only problem but when we wish to talk to the no. given will be not available nor any email will be answered you sent which was directed in the warranty card. So your warranty card will be useless forever. Don't buy BOAT earphones and headphones ever !!

name: Meenu
title: NO ONSITE WARRANTY, STOPPED IN 20 DAYS
content: LYEING IN COMMENTS ALSO AS IT WAS MENTIONED THAT A PERSON WOULD COME TO PICK UP THE HEADPHONE IF IT DOES NOT WORK PROPERLY THATS NOT TRUE, AS HEADPHONE STOPPED WORKING AFTER 20 DAYS OF BUYING, BUT BOAT PERSON WOULD NOT COME TO HOME BUT YOU HAVE VISIT THEIR STORE TO AVAIL WARRANTY,EVEN WHEN THE STORE IS 30 - 35 KM FROM YOUR HOME, THIER IS NO ONSITE WARRANTY ON HEADPHONE

name: Pavan
title: Best in the price
content: Decent sound quality and mic for its price , can't expect more , I previously owned the same ear phone and used it for one complete year until I lost them , so it's a sustainable ear phone too, It's comes with a nice aggressive design , Inbox it contains. 1) Ear phone. 2) Ear phone pouch. 3) Two extra pair of ear buds. 4) A warranty card. 5) A small booklet

name: Ankit Rawat
title: Good for songs and videos. Not so good when used during phone calls.
content: Iam posting this after almost 2-3 months of use. It's fine for listening songs or watching videos. When using for calls, it isn't great. The mike hangs too low and the person on the other side of the call won't be able to hear you. You have to hold the mike with ur hand near ur mouth. Other than that, it is a fine buy.

name: shantanu kaphale
title: Great to buy
content: Sound quality is pretty good crystal clear sound we can say about noise cancellation I will give it 4 stars only if you listen on high volume..& the bass is also great not so harsh or something like that.. I like the durability of the earphones it's just excellent. Writing this review after using it for 3& half months left earpiece is not audible

name: Rushikesh J.
title: Poor Sound Quality
content: Sound quality is really poor. My older Envent Beatz earphones are much better than this one. Not expected this quality from Boat. Poor Bass also.

name: Vinitha
title: Better than Boat 225 edition
content: For the price its totally better than boat225.. Update on Jan 31st. Purchased on Dec11.. Hardly 2 months! One ear it stopped working..withought wear n tear.. Updating this review after use! Now need to run behind Manufacturing Warranty!

name: Tahir Mirza
title: Worth the Money
content: I received the order used it tried and tested however it doesn't seem to be fully compatible with Iphones and Mi Phones won't fit properly need to hold the Jack to get proper sound else it will get wooshy. Overall it's worth the money Bad is very good.

name: pratikSwami
title: BOOM BOOM
content: Beats Beat (for the given price).. For this price range this is a steal. Mic works perfectly. Audio quality is splendid.. I contemplate a lot while purchasing electrons on-line because I cant try and test them, but this is really something that took me by surprise.. ITs good that BOAT is launching good products.. I recently purchased a USB cable as well and that too is wonderful. Unfortunately cant review it because of product policy, but trust me, from someone who thinks a thousand times before spending a penny, this is worth every paise you invest.

name: Alloysious Fernandes
title: Brace all metal & rock fans
content: People with Rock, punk and Metal genre..close your eyes and go for it..its meant for us..flat bass..more treble..pure sound..pure vocals..pure distortion..go for it. People with edm and hip hop stuff can go for boat basshead 102 (same price) or 225( higher price). This is master piece for all heavy metal fans out there..body is made out of plastic but still its boat with one year warranty

name: Gurpreet
title: Boat earphone
content: Mic is placed quite far in cable. It should be like samsung right earphone wire is short which helps a lot as other person can hear clearly. Now I have to hold mic in hand. Bass is just ok. Not upto mark. Jbl has far better bass but it's earphones are defective and dnt work after few days.

name: Vishal Bhartiy
title: Better than Sony and JBL. Second best to senhizers.
content: On this price range. These are the best ones to have comparing to any other brands. Build quality is best than any other brand in this segment.I have used senhizers, Sony and JBL. I say sound quality is second best to senhizers

name: chinmayee
title: Totally above average
content: I loved the earphones so far. They're really good I got it for 350 bucks.. Tho I'd say there's a bit of disturbance when yu listen on full blast but yu could totally ignore it. I'd give it 4 but it comes w a warranty so ima give it 5. One of the best in that range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Microphone issue even on 3rd order of boat
content: sound quality is fine for this price but i selected it for microphone. I ordered 3 butall the 3 times i got issues with microphone after few days. So i would suggest atleast dont buy if you really need a microphone.

name: Ritik raj rauniyar
title: Quality of sound is not upto the mark
content: This earphone does not cover every type of sound to play as the sound start cracking when certain rock songs are played which makes the quality of music very bad and mic is also little lower which makes the person to caught the mic in one hand and talk not satisfactory product from boat and this is my first bad experience from boat as i always use to buy only boat headphones and earphones.....hope this would mistake would not be repeated from such a reputed company

name: senotrius
title: Strictly for the budget conscious
content: I got it for 379inr.Kindly avoid if you can afford to spend more.low sound /volume compared to three year JBL I got for 500inr.. Use strictly for calls.The call button didn't work for me either.Maybe poor QC.

name: Shrutika Khanak
title: Best earphones in this price range.
content: This boAt product is my favourite one because it's got everything a normal person could ask for in earphones.. 1. Great bass. (Although, it does recede by time but it hardly matters). 2. Noise cancellation.. 3. Value for money. Great grab in this price range.. 4. Long lasting if used properly. (Mine lasted for 1 and half year)

name: Pranjal Gupta
title: Best Sound with poorest noise cancellation
content: What I like about this product is the bass quality with superior sound quality surrounded by tough fibre plastic .and long usage also not trouble much in the ears. And what I dislike about this product is that there is no noise cancellation in this bluetooth. Even if the company claims to have noise cancellation but in real me and my friends using the same bluetooth is about no clear voice is received on the other end.. I am writing this review after using this above mentioned product for last 6 months.

name: ‡¶™‡ßç‡ß∞‡ßÄ‡¶§‡¶Æ
title: BASS review, HONEST review
content: This is probably one of the best budget earphone here. Well the numbers suggest that. Its quite reasonably priced. Good sound quality and bass. Richness is clearly distinguishable from other rivals. Color variants available. Length of the cable is enough. I surely recommend.

name: critical honest reviewer
title: Durable earphones: value for money
content: I have been searching for cheap long lasting earphones....and had gone through 2 Phillips earphones before these.. I have another set of these with black colour. 10 months have gone by and are still working great

name: Ishan Juneja
title: Okay for the price.
content: Considering the price, the product is decent. The cable quality is fine and so is the sound. However, it could have been better considering other competitors. The bass is apt and nothing special to mention about.

name: GB
title: Overall ok product
content: Overall ok product , not such great for the price paid . earbuds are no so comfortable for long use. pause button not so useful in laptop and hardly works in Mobile.

name: SUDHANSHU SHEKHAR
title: Made in China
content: It is good product but i gave one rating because being an India based company it was designed in USA and made in China. Please look after it. Next time I'd like to see made in India written on it. Otherwise I'll return it.

name: Hemant Kashyap
title: Overwhelming bass in these surprisingly good sounding earphones. Best under 500
content: Recieved these today, after 5 days of wait, however. I was taken aback with the sound quality on these; the bass is really hard hitting on these. It can get a little overwhelming sometimes, so make sure you adjust the same from your phone Equalizer. The button feels tactile and easy to navigate. The wire could have been flat, or tangle free. It is thicker than usual, yes, but a flat wire would have made it feel better. The design is refreshing, the dual tone on the button and the earphones themselves are a treat to behold. I got the black ones, and the effect is much more noticeable on it.. All in all, in under 500, these earphones are the best you could have. Except maybe the Basshead 220, and 225 if you can get them. I just have an issue with the absence of flat wire, other than that, a must have for all the bassheads out there.

name: Rahul Gajanan Yelane
title: Product worth ‚Çπ380.sound and bass are good enough.
content: Everything is fine. Except one thing earbuds quality is lite plastic.if body is of metal of some hard material then product worth for ‚Çπ380.. Then i gave you 5 star. For earbuds quality 1 star deducted.. Sound and bass are perfect but properly aligned in ears.. Great noise cancellation.

name: Ajith Lal
title: Super bass and sound quality
content: This was soooper amazing wired headphone that I had ever. I didn't expect this much quality in terms of sound and bass. Durability is also good.. Having bit of ear ache while using it for long time. But other than that this one is worth for money.

name: Rathindranath Pradhan
title: Best ear phones
content: Great bang for the buck product overall check good sound quality good base and the noise cancellation is it good for you won't be disappointed for this product . price is a little bit high but considering the quality it is awesome. it comes with a pouch and changeable ear tips

name: JAGAN
title: It's a basic earphone.  For Music Lovers this is not good one.
content: I just bought based in Reviews. But it has extreme volume, u can't hear for a long hours.. Base" its not a good quality- its like a bunch of all sounds that's all. its simply basic headset.. For music Lovers, this is not for u. Go with better one.. No volume button in this.

name: Vaishali
title: Good
content: I ordered them in taffy pink colour and they are pretty pink .. The sound quality is good as they are on the ear headphone they cancel outer noise quite well.. But I found them quite annoying while putting them in my ears.. As they slip often

name: Ankit Gupta
title: Good earphones, low noise cancelation, deep mic
content: The sound is crystal clear with good highs but the noise cancelation is not as good as advertised. Needed this primarily for taking calls but the surrounding noise makes it tough to hear the other person. Also the mic is way too low and you'll have to hold it in your hand.

name: Deepak Sahu
title: Nice product and value for money for wired earphones
content: Nice product with quality of sound are awesome with Super Extra Bass.. I will suggest to all buyers who are searching wire earphone low price,. can be buy this product instead of purchase any local low price wired earphones.

name: Roshik Vohra
title: Poor service
content: Purchased boAt BassHeads 100 nearly 8 months back. After 6 months, I started getting a cracking sound from one of the earpiece. Contacted support and since the product was in warranty, they arranged a pick-up service. A replacement product was issued as shown on their website but hasn't been dispatched for a month! So, I don't have my earphones from last 2 month. The contact no. never works and no one replies to email. Pathetic service. Do not buy

name: Rohit K.
title: Value of Money Product.
content: The Product was definitely a value for money purchase. Sound Quality is decent the name basshead doesn't suit well as its just regular (not bad though) on bass. The Wire quality seems good its thick and reliable, I don't think it will get damaged easily on regular usage.

name: D. Pratik
title: Deep Bass
content: Working fine with deep bass and overall sound quality. Bass and treble balance is slightly imbalance (bass is more). filling comfortable in ears. So, worth to buy in this price range. Take it blindly with your favourite colours.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product but Bad Quality of Material
content: The product was good but the material used was of poor quality, The product worn-off after 2 months of use. Better to buy road side ear phone you will save on your hard earned money.

name: Govind Khandare
title: best in budget
content: we cant expect more from this price segment

name: Abhishek Bhardwaj
title: Want to be replaced defective product
content: Sound, bass, and noise quality is very nice but i buy this product in month of April but after 6 month mic is not work and my one friend also buy same purchase the same product and he also faced same problem and Amazon promised us to be replaced the product if when defects will be get within in year but when my wife called to Amazon call centre they responded this will be not replace........... So please request to all customers when you buy any product please take warranty card or email from Amazon authority......

name: Alok Panda
title: Good for music, average for gaming
content: I liked the sound quality and as of its name its good for songs with base good for music though i would not recommend for gaming because you don't need quality of footsteps you basically need the direction and audibility of footsteps so not much for shooting games though. It was a nice deal for me I got it at ‚Çπ349 on republic day sale. Overall as a earphone it's good

name: Suhana C.
title: Delicate material
content: Sound is quite loud and good bass. However leaks out of the earphones.. wires too delicate. And quality overall is okay, not so sturdy.

name: Rayyan Deshmukh
title: I didn't buy this for a month use!
content: The earphone worked perfectly fine for a month and after that the jack keeps on coming out! and that's so annoying.. I tried with different phones as well but it seems to be an issue with the jack in just a month! I've been a user of Boat Earphones and this one's the worst ever

name: ravi pualasa
title: Best wired earphones
content: Boat bass head 100 wired earphones are the best wired earphones in the market.. It's cheaper in price but excellent in quality, beats jbl and skull candy earphones as well. This is my 2nd buy as i lost my 1st one after 2 years approx.. Go for it guys!

name: Omkar
title: Sounds best with Equilizer
content: If you don't have equilizer then it sounds flat. But if you install some good equilizer, it sounds great. You can easily compare sound quality to headphones from 2k range.. I doubt a bit regarding its reliability due to wire size. I will update this review after few months of usage.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome headphone, must buy.
content: I go through many headphones like sony, redmi ear capsules, jbl. But this one is best in this range. Other headphones like sony is also good and still in working condition. I bought sony and boat in June 2018. Today the boat is stopped working. But sony is still on. In term comfortability the boat goes with 5/5. For bass and price 5/5. I used this headphone roughly and it worked well.. Hats off for heavy-duty. Thanks for such a great headphone.

name: arun kerala
title: Please don't buy this money waste time waste
content: Customer please don't choose boAt brand as an headset purchase .Please choose another because I purchased it on September 21. 2018 . First 1 month headsets have no complaints then sound was not clear after user 1 month no bass effects . 1year warranty is really waste for this product i cannot claim my warranty it's really waste don't buy this product .

name: Addi J
title: Pathetic customer service
content: Ok headphones. Sound quality is good. Durability is not long. But the customer service after sale is worse. You can not track them down. One earpiece stopped working after 6 month of use. Trying to reach them but no luck. Email, call and there portal you will not get any reply.

name: Anurag Pandey
title: Very good at a price of Rs.399/-
content: A decent earphone at decent price,worth every penny and comes with 1 year warranty as well with 5 colors to choose from,looks sweet as well,sound quality is decent,what else you want my friend?

name: Mudita Malviya
title: Mishandling my phone like a ghost
content: It was working fine with my vivo z pro for 4 months but now when connected to phone it is mishandling my phone by opening google voice, media tone control, songs playing on its own. Its really scary. It is my humble request to the seller to change my defective set

name: Ashajyothi
title: Fantastic product!!
content: Sound, bass, noise cancellation etc.. Everything is good about it. And I think this earphones are only the best one in the market. But there is only one small problem with this earphones. When we keep it in the ear it will come some out.. So we need to keep it some tightly in our ear. Then no problem.. But it's good one guys go for it..

name: shaikahmed
title: Sound and compare jbl
content: Really awesome feel I like this earphones very much, anad with reasonable price boat give awesome feel of songs clearity, jblc50 is same if we compare for this but jbl, I not like much because my jbl earphones work till 6 month approx after that it‚Äôs stop working one side, but boat will give approx 1 year or more, so recommand low price boat is better.

name: Vineet Jha
title: Not the Best one but It's Great
content: The earphones quality is good. Wire is sturdy and tangle free. Now coming on the actual work, bass is not as profound as Bassheads 225 and max volume is also not comparable with Bassheads 225. But noise cancellation is superior than Bassheads 225 and fits better due to plastic design. It's a great product for people who don't necessarily listen to head banging music.

name: Raisa
title: Nice
content: I ordered them awhile ago and think that the sound quality is quite good. There is also warranty available from Boats for one year which is expected from a good brand.. Well, I would recommend it

name: Manasvi
title: üëç
content: One more awesome product by boat.I am using these bassheads since 6months,in those 6 months more then 1time it experienced water put still the mic the sound quality is just like earlier.Talking about its material quality the material is very strong and it also looks very cool and has an attractive design.Really amazing ,should buy this .

name: Barunes Padhy
title: Worth the price
content: 5/5 for everything.. Anyone who gives less than 5 for bass, sound quality or Noise Cancellation is dumb.. For the price you pay (I paid 379 on a lightning deal! It's original price is 399), these earphones do a damn good job. I mean, you are paying just 379 and getting a really premium sound quality for the price. Cant really comment about durability since I just got these.

name: himaja
title: Waste
content: Not nice. It has been just 4months I bought this. It is not working properly. One side of earphones are not working. It's totally waste of money. Better you can go with 399/- earphones.

name: Deepender Singh
title: Sound quality
content: Sound quality not okay. This product is only 5% of my expectations. I have boat rockers 240 wireless neckband and there is too much difference in both boat products. You can say if i give100 points to boat rockers 240 then there i give only 5 points to Boat Bass head 100. This is truly very disappointing.. May be this product is not compatible with Realme XT

name: L.Sengottuvel
title: Not upto my expectation
content: I write this review after 2 months of usage.It is good till now.I have experienced bad package during delivery but the product was not damaged.At the moment I thought my money is gone.xd..Sound and bass quality is good.And Noise cancellation also works great.If you planned to buy a headset for long term usage don't buy this.This headset is for only normal usage like hearing youtube and mojo videos during night time..Overall product is good.

name: Bilbiophile_25
title: Good earphones
content: Pros -. - Good Sound Quality. - Fits better to ear (than my earlier JBL earphone). - Good Noise cancellation. Cons -. - Build quality material can be better. - Highest Sound is not good enough with this earphone.

name: Girish
title: Great value for money
content: The quality is good for the given price range.. Of course it does not match with Bose, Sony or Apple.. However, the sound quality is impressive at the given price range.. Happy with the product.. The design and finishing is topnotch.

name: Helal
title: Crappy earphone not replaced Even in warranty period
content: I bought this earphone and it work only for a month then stopped one ear after that mic stopped working.. When I Went to replace this faulty item to service center they told me they'll not replace this item because they don't support this model earphone in there service center.. This is so cheap technique to sell crappy item and even in warranty period they will not replace. #crappyEarphobe. #dontBuythis. #lootingCustomerMoney

name: Amazon Customer
title: Non-functional!
content: The headphones look good only for looks-wise. Performance is worse. Doesn't fit well in the ear, have to push the earplugs deep into the ear in order to stay in place. Voice clarity is awful and not clear at all. Stopped working within two months with fluctuating audibility in either of the two ear plugs. The earphones provided with my Samsung mobile work much better than this useless product!

name: Micky
title: Simply Great...
content: Excellent headphone (earphones) with this price and great service (I have not taken but read and heard about it's service). Just note that with more volume songs or voice can be out of the earbuds. So this is the only bad point I noticed. Allover for normal use its great and this price is also very competitive for this kind of awesome earphones.. Simply Awesome...

name: Sufyaan
title: Don't purchase it from Amazon instead go and purchase it from boat webpage
content: The product is amazing and worked very well but only for 3 months after that one side got defected so I placed a complain in boat website and the product got replaced and the product send by boat was much more good.So I recommend don't purchase the product from Amazon instead go and purchase it directly from the baot website it would be much better.

name: John Doe
title: Don't buy
content: Believe me it's just waste of Ur money, don't regret after buying this like me, the earphones never fit into your ears it's always tries to drop I was like God damn what's wrong with this ..

name: soni
title: Don't buy please?
content: Not working... within 3 months it got damaged...if go for claiming process they will send you this message :. #Note: Hey boAtheads! Under any circumstances, there would not be any monetary exchanges for the warranty claims of your boAt products within warranty period at the boAt authorised service centres. In case of any such instances, please let us know on our email id info@imaginemarketingindia.com

name: Sudheer B
title: Good one
content: Satisfied with the product, but the only thing it's showing 379/- but after adding to cart it's showing 399/- and delivery 40/- extra, amazon should display the correct prices. Overall no issues with this you can go on with it, with out any second thought.

name: Nilesh Sangle
title: Worth a Value best Deal with one year warranty in less price
content: It's worth a value for Its cost... If you have slight low Budget and don't want to go for Boat 225 then You can surely trust on this product it has all same features slight difference between Bass performance and Noise cancellation between them... Else It's a best product in this slight Less price... Only one issue its wire is always tangled when we Take it out for use which is not happened with Boat 225

name: Ekta thanvi
title: PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT
content: Please don't buy this product it's waste of money, and even if you buy don't exchange it warranty it will take 15 to 20 to get exchanged and even the exchange one will not work properly and after that when you will again file a complaint then their process of exchanging the product will remain yhe same and you will get your product within 15 to 2p days again and even the 2nd time exchanged product will defective.

name: Suraj
title: They mentioned boat Bassheads,the product was BoAt but there is no BasS.
content: The earphones at this price sound quality was good but I felt disappointed with BasS.. When I compared with Mi earphones this boAt earphones has a very low bass and also the mic receiving low voice while speaking a voice call. If u r looking for a high basS, this item will disappoint u. But it giving some basS when the sound effects & equalizer was on in the Device, if ur phone has no equalizer it would be no bass sound. Overall -. Sound quality - 5/5. BasS quality - 3/5. Mic hearing voice quality - 3/5. Product wire/external quality - 5/5

name: john
title: Ok ok product
content: Earphones are quite good....but didn't like the build quality as it is very delicate easy to worn out soon.... coming to the sound quality its ok not expect much bass as they are not comfortable in ear.....if u r looking for some good earphones i suggest u to check Boat Bass heads for better quality...

name: AmazonCustomer
title: Good Sound quality
content: I had been using quite a lot of earphones and this one's sound quality is too good. Got additional 3 pairs of earbuds as well :) ... The cable is very soft and looks to be durable for more time when compared to similar products. Overall happy with the purchase

name: Sumit
title: Nice sturdy earphones
content: Nice earphones in general. It's been over 1 and half months since I am using them. The thing that I particularly noticed was bass quality is average since the sounds of drums are damped(not very clearly audible) and the sounds of metallic or high pitch instruments are over amplified. Build quality is super without doubt.

name: Imran S.
title: Enough bass, but there is a mic issue.
content: They are excellent ear buds. Not too much bass. I had a realistic expectation going in.. The only issue I could find was mic is horrendous, deducted 1 üåü for that. You have to hold it up to your mouth so the other person can hear you. Most of the times during video calls it becomes so bad that during video call people on other end have to hold their phone to their ears to hear me. That should not happen but it does.. Other than the mic issue. Sound output is satisfactory at this price point.

name: Mayank Vasu
title: BEST headsets MUST BUY
content: The BEST thing I like about these headsets is the BASS quality. The Things I like the most are. 1. Bass Quality (Best for bass lovers). 2. Fitting in the ear (Sits in your ear and doesn't fall down on its own). 3. Noise Cancelling (Once you have weared them you will not listen any external noise only and only your music)

name: Sanand Tripathi
title: bad fit and bass!
content: product is good for the calm or relaxing music lovers but not good for modern youth due to average bass and noise cancellation.. also if you have greater than an average size ears then these can give you pain regarding their fit!

name: Sejal Gupta
title: Its an average product
content: Its noisy and penetrates your ears while hearing songs and videos and also the mic is not on a good position..it needs to be more upside near to your mouth so that the you don't need to hold the mic in your hand when you talk to someone!

name: Hardeep Singh
title: Experienced
content: I wasn't expecting that I had to write this review for boat,I have two mobiles redmi and honor, I plugged in both devices and the sound quality in both devices was pathetic in honor it was not even working properly I mean sound was very low even on high volume its feel like I was listening at 1 or 2 vol. Very disappointed by boat

name: Arnami Roy Choudhury
title: Great one. Pocket friendly !
content: This is the third time I'm buying this one... absolutely love this one... i already bought 2pc. Earlier for my mom and my friend. Great quality. Good, clear sound, bass is fine too. Absolute bomb in a budget

name: Azhan Muzhally
title: Quality earphones
content: I've been using this for a few months now. I liked every aspect of it. Sound quality has been excellent. It doesn't get tangled up like other cheap quality earphones.. However, the mic could have been a little higher up. I tend to lift up the mic piece and keep near my mouth to be audible. But probably it's just me, because I naturally tend to speak with low volume.

name: Nayan Mohitkar
title: Boat - Quality product, and Value for money
content: I have purchased this for the 2nd time for my family member. I am using this earphone from last 1 year. It is a product with a best build in quality, and value for money. Sound quality is good. Noise cancellation and bass quality can be improved.

name: shivani
title: Disappointed by the purchase
content: Useless...i bought it 3 months ago and now it stop working and it's been a month i am trying to reach the customer care services of boat they are not entertaining it, also i register my product online on his site but didn't get any response from them. I want to replace that product but their customer care services are so bad that they don't listen the problem and cut the phone in the mid of conversation.. In future, i will not buy any thing from Boat. I'm very disappointed by my purchase.

name: Dhruv Singh
title: Amazingly awesome product!!
content: At this price point, couldn't ask for more.. Just the right combination of bass, melody and noise cancellation.. True melody to the ears and most importantly, even after hours of use it doesn't become uncomfortable.. Go for it!!

name: Saranpreet | Kaursonfleek
title: Worth the price
content: I have been using this since I ordered, fits comfortably in the earhole. The sound quality is also good,but it does not really helps with the noise cancellation part. But then what do even expect in such a price.

name: Alvin
title: Earphone cum speaker
content: It's been almost 15 days since I bought it. I would say, look wise that the product is good and Red color looks quite quirky. Coming to the sound quality part, the product didn't reached my expectations.. Let me clear it that Sound is pretty good. The problem is that for low volume it works decently, but as you increase the volume everyone else can also hear it.. My suggestion is don't go for the Red color one, black one work better and more smoothly.

name: UT
title: Boat is the Best
content: I mean this is my 2nd Boat ear phone. I bought cos I had lost my earlier one while travelling. This is One of the best branded quality earphone under 400‚Çπ. It just delivers quality bass every time. No complaints. Love it. I will come back to Boat, if needed.

name: Sumit Bhattacharjee
title: Superb
content: Super sound, super bass, super product. Go for it guys, its abdolutely brilliant. Very good product by boat. Thanks amazon for the super fast blink of an eye delivery. üòäüòä

name: Chandra Gupta Roy
title: Damaged product, but i still believe in BOAT, Returned.
content: I believe in Boat , because of my experience with it's other products and services, but this time, it's probably a damaged product. Wasted my time, Sob! Probably will buy again.

name: JANARANJAN MISHRA
title: Value for the money and is wonderful
content: So this is an amazing product. I love the sound quality and how it perfectly fits in my ears. I love this colour too. I also got a little pouch along with it and that's pretty good too.. I would say that this earphone is just awesome and is pocket friendly too.. Today's the first day if me using it and I'm loving it. Let's see how long it lasts. :)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth the cost
content: I have used Sony and bose earphones and this one comparatively doesn't satisfy me to that level. But yes if u use Mi, samsung and other same category earphones thn this will surprise u positively.

name: Ace
title: Hopeless mic. Very bad.
content: This is my 4th Boat earphone and all of them had problem with mic. Sound quality is really good and when it comes to mic it fail to shine as good. Now it's useless for me. Can't return it because it got spoiled within 20days and warranty is for 10 days

name: Karan Atreya
title: good product
content: product is good, sound quality is good, but not as great as mentioned in advertisement, looks are cool, able to hear background noise with earphones on, could have been better

name: Rishabh Sharma
title: HONEST REVIEW
content: Pros - Sound quality is awesome.. Build quality is also great as It looks like premium earphone.. Cons - I ordered this earphones as It was written "SUPER EXTRA BASS". But seriously, I am very disappointed and returning this item as the bass is not upto the mark. I'll give 2/10 for BASS.. If you are not a BASS lover, you can go for it.. But if want some great basa sound, sochna bhi mt.

name: Dhruv Sutariya
title: Unregretful decision! üòù
content: Okay then, I'm writing this review after using it for 2 days and its experience has led me to say that this is an absolute music feeler!. The very first thing that I personally loved in it, is the tangle free cord/wire. This actually means a lot! üòÇ. Followed by its sound quality and the bass, which are being exceptional and will make you addicted towards it. *BEWARE* üòÇ. When it comes to price, i don't think so that any other earplugs could survive in this price margin.. Finally, thanking the company BOAT for this fantastic product!

name: ulkesh p.
title: This earphone is good, but the base is low..(which is unexpected).
content: Well.. i thought at this price i'll get a nice bass type earphone.. but this earphone is balanced its not bass type.. its bass is very low and it has loud sound which is nice tho.. an 100 rupee earphone can give better bass than this. But still its not that bad. Its light weight and has good in comfort.. the sound output os good and loud. And this earphone is not for bass heads.. bass is low unexpectedly.

name: Abhijeet S.
title: Good product
content: The sound quality is great and rh biggest advantage is the velcro strap with the product. The velcro strap allows you to properly fold the product once used ensuring that you do not have to struggle to untangle it next time. Plus the color and design is just so pretty.

name: SUSANTA MISHRA
title: Without knowing swimming, dont buy BOAT
content: 7-8 months use, one side speaker gone. I had purchased with with lots of hope after seeing positive feedbacks, but, first impression will always be last impression & i.e. "NOT RECOMMENDED".

name: Manoj Lonar
title: One month review - Good buy for this price
content: Satisfied with the product. The sound quality is awesome at this price. and good for daily usages like Zoom or Google Meet calls. Not great for music lover. Okish. Go for it.

name: Ashish Rumde
title: Pathetic and fraud services and poor product quality
content: Pathetic experience with Boat services.. Boat is literally providing pathetic customer service. My earphones has stop working within 2 months and I had made a complaint but their is no response. Fraud services by boat india.

name: Prashanth
title: Product reviews
content: Stylish, super sound bass, clear listening, comfort with perfect fit with lengthy wires, suitable for all the devices like mobile, laptop, tab compatible of Google assistant Cortana and Siri, 2 in 1 button - play and pause and call answer

name: Shahul
title: WASTE OF MONEY, PLEASE DON'T BUY, Mi BASIC EARPHONES ARE BETTER THAN THIS , POOR AUDIO QUALITY.
content: Worst earphones, NO NOISE CANCELLATION, NO BASS , Sound quality is very poor, build quality also very poor, mi basic is better than this at this price range@400. If u have budget around 500 , better to buy Boult audio loupe earphones. I have actually buyed this on seeing the brand boat ,but it doesn't deserve it. Overall rating is 5/10. It works like rs.100 earphones and if u compare with mi basic earphones, mi basic are the best in all rounder. please don't buy it, At this price range many other earphones are there .

name: Supreet Kaur
title: Best earphones ever
content: Best quality earphones,I have ever used. Just love the sound quality,fit in ears and everything. It comes in nice packaging. It also includes four extra buds,in case we lost or accidentally get damaged. I recommend to everyone. Just go for it guys, without much thinking. Best quality at this price.

name: dilip
title: Disappointed with the quality
content: Disappointed with the product quality. Facing issue within 10 days.. While using it through mobile phone, Receivers are complaining for poor voice quality.. Its connector to mobile is also creating issue.. its 13 days now so can't refund or replace it. So, Have to contact after sales service now on 13 days of purchase.

name: Jaipur stars
title: Best from BoAtüòç‚ù§
content: I genuinely liked this Earphoneüòç. Sound Quality of this earphone is literally Awesome.. clean Sound , Bass is Awesome higher then expectations.. This earphone has support of Noice cancellation by this there is no outer noice problem during call.‚ù§‚ù§. This earphone from BoAt is just best.‚ù§

name: Surya
title: Blindly buy it.
content: I ordered this product 10 days ago. I got a product which was of less bass. My ears started aching due to high volume. I felt annoyed and wanted complete refund. I spoke to customer care and they assured a replacement for another good unit. Today I got the replacement. Sound clarity is perfect. Bass quality is very good. Noise cancellation is good. They provide extra 2 pairs of rubber buds. And above all 1 complete year warranty. Can't expect more.. Guess what, I got it only at ‚Çπ250.. Totally worth Money.

name: astha bisht
title: Not good for long term
content: I'm using boat products from last 1.5 year.. Quality is good.. But not durable for long term.. I have to replace my earphones after every 6 month. I bought it on 19 jan.. And now it sto working on 20 may. :(

name: Abhishek
title: Service is very poor
content: May be everything about this earphone is good... But the service is very poor.... After 6 months of use, one side of the earphone stopped working... When i try to claim your warranty.... They rejected it by saying that "regester with complete address"... All tough i have registered with every thing they asked for... Don't buy it... Rather Go for the boat earphones.

name: Raju
title: Bass
content: Best affordable earphones. Sound quality is good. Iam happy with the product. But, after the 5 month of usage they stopped working. Noise Distortions. I tried to claim the warranty of the product. It got picked up. Just waiting for the replace. Hope I get it asap. But worth buying anyway.

name: Sayed Khalid M Faredie
title: Excellent sount quality and great noise cancellation.
content: I have Boat as well as Mi earphones with mic. Both are wired. I think Boat has narginalky better. But Mi is very durable. It's been wirh me for past one year. Boat is a new purchase.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product....
content: I have just used mi earphones and it is quite better that such Chinese company.its sound is loud but bass could me better..it has plastic build for this it is very light weight to use and its buds quality is also quite good than mi earphones which come in same price..BUT.........ITS not very comfortable in ears.for long use your ear will start paining as its buds are not much soft .but its acceptable you can go for it.

name: Mayank
title: Good Quality
content: It has a sound quality.. Noise cancellation is average and just forget about the bass.. I have also used Mi basic earphones that have a much better bass but that comes with 6 months warranty.. I bought this piece only because my priority is not bass and it also comes with 1 year warranty. If your priority is also same and budget is 400 then you can go for it.

name: Jitendra Prem
title: Simply Peaks
content: After one month , I'm giving review ..One of the best earphones..!! No doubt ,u can purchase it immediately ..! Sound quality & Bass peaks ..No Noise ,,Simply Awesome Quality ..For this Earphones , 400 price is very cheap, For this Quality ...and white Colour Earphones Looking very Rich look....!!

name: Likhitha
title: I won't recommend to buy this one
content: It just worked fine for a one and half month suddenly it started giving sounds and then it totally stopped and my brother's one is only working on one side, the sound and packaging is all great when it arrived, I ordered Sennheiser llike 6 month back before lockdown I guess it's still working fineeee! I won't recommend to buy this one.

name: Dhivagar
title: Money worthy..
content: It has been 4 months since i bought this product. I am so satisfied with product. The build quality is awesome with this price. And sound clarity also good. This is the best earphone in this price than others because of its quality on all arround. Even i put this headphone to washing maching mistakenly and washed for one and half hour. Still working.. It is money worthy... Dont compare this product with other products like sony, skulcandy, etc.. They are not giving in this price...

name: AP
title: Amazing. Very happy.
content: The mic is pretty good and clear. The shape fits into the ear perfectly and delivers top notch sound.. For those of you thinking this shape will look weird while wearing, here's a picture. It looks great.. So basically... Sound great ‚òëÔ∏è. Looks Great ‚òëÔ∏è. Mic Reception is great ‚òëÔ∏è. (Oh also, you get an year's warranty). What else do you need?!

name: Prime User
title: Worst product
content: Dont bu this After 2 months Right side of the Headphone is not working, Rubber Came out easily.. This is the worst product which i bought online. Please go for JBL . I m again spending 400 bucks for JBL headphone. No boAt again.

name: Digantey
title: Great product low budget
content: Reveiwing this product after few months of use. Sound quality is very good. Bass is ok.. noise cancellation is not good. But in this budget this earphone is just fabulous. Go for it !

name: Devansh Chawla
title: Boat- The worst company i have ever seen
content: My jack got damaged within 1.5 months. Never buy boat earphones. I have purchased 2 earphones of boat. 1 got damaged within 4 months and this product had life of 1.5 months only. And morever replacement of boat is the worst. I had given my earphones for replacement on 22nd june and it is more than 45 days, they have not returned and they are not replying to the mail regarding this. So go for JBL anytime.

name: Shasiswarna
title: Not supporting to all mobiles I think so
content: Headphones are fine but it's not working with my redmi note 8 phone, when ever I connect them with my phone it's operating my phone automatically and microphone doesn't working don't know the problem we did not use them that much not more than 10 times up to now. For laptop theese are fine but microphone doesn't working.

name: JoeMat
title: I had it but I don't know where is it
content: The thing which I don't like about this product is I can't find it right now and I want it to be used for the product review purpose. Before that, it was working fine, the sound quality was good The wires are freaking clumsy.

name: Ram Sundar
title: VFM headphones, MIC placement is bad not a true handsfree.
content: The sound quality is very good and the audio is very clear on both calls & music. I couldnt feel any difference in bass since it only sounds like any other headphone without any bass enhancement. The placement of mic is a big letdown since u have to use a hand to hold it near ur mouth for u to be heard. For that reason it cant be truly handsfree and it would have made sense to place the mic at an appropriate position.

name: Pronab Barman
title: LET ME BE HONEST
content: Product is fine...but after using 3 or 4 month( bought it on October,19) I was having issue on Microphone(from jan or Feb 2020)......as it was in warranty period I have registered my issue with coustmer supports...Nothing happened..."NO" support from the other end.....I repeat "NO SUPPORT" form "BOAT COUSTMER SERVICE ". I would give 3.5 out of 5 for the headphones but '0' / "ZERO" for coustmer service. Reccomend buy it wisely .

name: Dhanashree
title: Durable hands free
content: This is the most durable hands free I have till date. I have been using them for a year now and have no complaints. Usually with my headphones either the mic goes off or one of the earpieces go off. But this one has been used rough and has endured all the rough handling

name: Rakesh Ch. Jena
title: Best in this price range, Reviewing after 4 month of use
content: With this price segment, It's awesome. Go for it.. Pros: Cheap, Sound quality is great, Bass is satisfactory. Getting a brand like bOAt in this price range awesome.. Cons: Cable feels a bit delicate. Thant's the single cons.

name: Fredy
title: 'Punch'es way above its weight
content: I really didn't had much expectations with this, but this one delivered surprising results.. Pros. - Good base. - Clear Vocals. - Extremely easy to drive. - no complaints about mic quality. - Isolation is good. Cons. - The think is a tad shrilly. - May get fatigued after prolonged listening (YMMV)

name: Kedar Joshi
title: Good product
content: Product is of good quality and sound output is also better than the Mi Headphones which I had previously especially the bass.. Only grudge is the wire is unbraided and tends to tangle a lot.. Other than that, good product at this price point

name: Sayooj
title: Amazing product.
content: Its a fantastic product from the well known company boAt.. They have used fantastic design as you can see in the product page.. Very good built quality.. It is the best in-ear headphone in the price.. Hope it helps you..

name: Saranyan
title: Best Customer Service
content: The service that you can get. I bought the headphones on September, It was working fine and suddenly one day it stopped working. I booked for a warrenty replacement. There were regular updates and follow ups and the product was picked up from my home and a replacement was dispatched within a week. All this service for 350 buck headphones. Really Impressed with Boat Customer Service

name: Rikhav vora
title: The Best
content: Best in this price range or even a bigger budget. working perfectly and its been a year or more. mic works good. product looks really good. fits perfectly. and a nice Velcro comes with it to keep it organised. MUST BUY.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ultimate quality
content: The sound quality is decent enough, loud but not loud enough to provide noice cancellation although that cannot be expected from earphones in this range.. The one thing i would like to mention is the build quality. No earphone has lasted me this long, not one!! And that is a huge accomplishment as i devour earphones.

name: Fanindra
title: Not durable and sound quality sucks
content: The product is not durable at all. It sucks at sound quality. The MI basics has more good quality sound than this one.. That's cheaper as well.. Sound quality: 6/10. Durability:5/10. Noise cancellation: 5/10. Workout: Definitely not for workout. Value for money: 6/10

name: Bhaskar Taneja
title: Quiet sturdy
content: Been using them for about six months or more, but they are quiet sturdy given my rough usage.. Okay in sound and bass. Not for music lovers , but for daily work.. Edit 2:. Bought it again, as they are good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product duplicay
content: See both the packects.. See in the packets carefully.. Bass Heads 110 & Bass Head 100.. The one which I received from Amazon in bass Heads 100 which seems to be duplicate.. And today I purchased one offline from my nearby retail store. Today's purchase is BASS HEAD 110 which the retailer claims to be original.. So whom to believe?. Amazon seller / Offline retailer?

name: Manish Nandurdikar
title: Chating by seller by giving different project
content: First of all product which is shown and what is delivered is different. Also one side of headphone is not working. That means it's useless for Music listening. Also design of earbuds is such that earplug pops out of ear. Not opting for replacement as I don't want to take efforts for small amount. This is kind of cheating. I hopr Amazon is listening

name: Rushabh patel
title: Don't Buy Boat
content: I requested for replacement under warranty period and they picked up the product next day. But it has been more than 50 days and not only that i haven't replacement but they are clueless about thier service. I had called them around 6-7 times and Everytime they give utterly nonsensical excuses. Customer service from boat is worst of all. My suggestion is "Don't buy Boat product".

name: Akhil Gupta
title: Product is good but not durable.
content: Product quality is good, They are comfortable, soft and to use. You will in love with the product.. But these are not long lasting pair of headphone. I bought that product twice and purchased for my more than 8 friends.. But everyone faces the same issue that one of the earplug stops working after 7-8 months.

name: Krishti
title: Working fine after a year
content: Purchased this product in July 2019 and its November 2020 now and its still working just fine, the music quality has dropped slightly but its totally worth the 350 rupees .. The design does make it impossible to lay on your side and enjoy the movie. But even after all the strain the earphones still doesn't give in.

name: CHIRAYU A.
title: Don't buy, it's a waste of money
content: I bought Boat 100 because they said "extra bass", but it's bass quality didn't met my expectations.. I have my samsung earphone (which comes by default when u purchase samsung phone) and it has better bass and better sound quality.. I also checked mike of both earphones, and i found that mike of Samsung is far better then Boat 100.. If u r a boat fan, then go for boat 225 instead of boat 100

name: S
title: Decent for price
content: Very attractive and good sound quality . However the wires are thick and not very flexible making it a little inconvenient to use ..but very decent product for the price .

name: Prashant Goswami
title: Average,sound quality is good but not durable
content: This was a gr8 wired earphone but i did not knew that it would not even last 1 year... You cannot claim its warranty easily and why will you even waste your time on such a cheap price product...i would prefer Go for JBL if ur budget can be extended by little more otherwise it is overall average...i m very disappointed by Boat and i m only giving 3 stars bcoz of its sound quality nad one more thing it is not durable and one of its side (left) is not working now...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one
content: I have used it over a month now and it's functioning very well. The length of these headphones are quite long and sound quality is good. It doesn't provide superb noise cancellation but does it to some extent. The person at the other end can complain of background noise if your background is too noisy. Overall they are pretty good headphones at such price. Nothing impressive but nothing bad also.

name: Manoj Saxena
title: Headphones not working
content: Hi... I bought this headphone was delivered to me on 18/03/2019. it was working fine till 10 days back but I noticed that there was no sound in the left side earphone & today it has gone absolutely dead & there is no sound into the same. I have been using the same with my Samsung Note 5 phone. Plz have the same replaced immediately, as the same stand the warranty of one year.. Thanks.... Manoj Saxena. +91 9811675500

name: Pallavi Mishra
title: Not satisfied
content: Sound quality is good and bass as well.. But design is poor wire quality is not good enough very thin wire and can be damage if not cared about. Jack is not in L shaped. so overall not impressive headphone.. 2.8/5

name: Sushumna Sawargaonkar
title: Good product at reasonable price
content: I have been using this earphone for more than a year now.This is me second purchase I ordered it to gift it to my mother...The sound quality is quite good and it also cancels out the noise....apart from this it is available at a very reasonable price and comes in good packaging

name: Neha singh
title: For music yes, for calling no.
content: All good, except mic.. No notice cancellation, and mic needs to be just near to your mouth for clear voice, which is not seems good.. I gave 3 for sound quality in speakers.

name: Bishvendra Singh
title: *Good for Mobile Games/Entertainment not for Music* *Bass is bad*
content: If you are music lover especially a bass lover: then don't get these. *Not Recommended*. If you likes watching movies, playing Mobile games like PUBG Mobile, COD Mobile etc then: you can go for these. *Good for Gaming/Entertainment*

name: Suraj D.
title: Best in this price.
content: I have used seinheisser cx 180 as well as cx 213. I won't compare it with cx 180 as it was best in its class.But its definitely better than cx 213 for sure. I got it in RS.349.I think it's a steal in this price. Go for it if u are getting it for less than 500.else choose cx 180.

name: Sushree Y.
title: Good quality for this price.
content: One thing I liked most is that we can access Google Assistant. For this price it is the best. Design is good. Comfortable in ear buds. Comes with a potli like cover. That's is good.

name: Vishal SingH
title: More good product at this price
content: I product was good but I feel like i made a mistake becoz at Same price of 100 series thier was 162 at same price but meanwhile this product was also good but quality of earphone can not justify it's price and if you want to buy this earphone plz check out some higher varients as 152 or 162 or 225 at the time of sale the prices of all these product came to same price.

name: Sachin kumar singh
title: Awesome , The best in earbuds
content: It's awesome at this price of 399rs.. But in Mi phones it's a monster ‚ô•Ô∏è.. This earphone has the best earbuds that is not available even in 1000rs' cost earphone as I compared to The House of Marley's earphone. It feels very comfortable in long time use .

name: MK
title: Waste of money
content: Waste of money.. Initially It was good .. After 2 and half months left side head set was completely stop working.. Honestly saying within a week of regular use its dead..

name: SATENDRA SINGH BHADOURIYA
title: Cost Orignal, Item is duplicate .
content: Sound quality , noise cancellation and bass quality are just average....This is duplicate item. Whuch is available near by local shop in 200 Rs only...It is Made In China... Delivery 2as on time thanks for that.. but kindly improve your standard don't make us fool on the name of original .... Duplicate

name: Sumit Borse
title: ONE SIDE STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS......
content: GUYZ......i know they r using celebrity figures for bran promotion but DONT FALL FOR TRAP......THIS IS MY 2ND TIME I TRUSTED IT BUT IT STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS...also due to COVID..SERVICE CENTRES ARE LIMITED AND NOT AT ALL HELPFUL TO CUSTOMERS......LOOK OTHER OPTIONS

name: Karthik Iyer
title: 3 Click function does not work
content: The product description reads that this earphone features a HD microphone to make crystal clear calls - making life easier on the go, play/pause music or answer/end calls with one-click, track forward with two-clicks or back with 3 clicks make these earphones extremely user-friendly. However, the 3 click function does not work. The previous song is not played when you click thrice. I have bought this product 5 times, only once I got an earphone, which had the 3 click previous function working. Otherwise, its a good earphone

name: Purnesh shetty
title: Good wired earphones for its price point
content: Good quality earphones at a very low price.... Boat as a company never disappoint... the base, the melody, high pitches etc. are all on point... I got this for 479 including the tax and shipping etc... And the benefit of buying a boat product is that they are also great service providers of you have any problems regarding the product.. they are quick and easy going people.... So even if you have a problem with your product then they sort you out without a fuss and you are good to go in no time...

name: Sonu
title: Lovely colour with good quality and sound
content: Yes when use long time the ear will be pain but as per local ear which I have almost 2-4 in a month , damage time to tkme bt it is good in quality and. Sound ... looking lovely that way I have order it again in pink colour for my bhabhi also thanks ...plz give discount for next time thanks love u Amazon

name: Jiten
title: Decent earphones for the price, but not too good for bass and loudness
content: Build quality is good, but sound quality is ok. Can't √ßompare it with Sennheisers of the world, considering even the price is lower. But if you want more bass and loud sound, then skip this one n spend few more hundreds and get a basic Sennheiser for 900 bucks

name: Neeraj
title: Worth Money and Fast delivery.
content: I've been using MI products since 4 years and they never fail to satisfy us. Bass quality is good and very light earphones. This time they've provided baat also to keep the earphones. Overall with buying and I received within 24 hours.

name: Nima K.
title: Good for daily usage
content: I like the boat bass head 220 more it had more bass but this one also not that bad. It does not have that much bass compared to boat 220 but still ok to use for daily usage while in metro or home surfing videos. Plus this earphones shape is comfortable in ear where as boat Bassheads 220 was not but it had more bass than this hawk edition. Overall ok if you want to buy what more can you expect in 399 rps.

name: Rahul
title: loose contacts. crackling noise
content: I purchased this because of the good experience of my earlier headphone.. This headphone looks good and cheap but this is having quality problems. I keep getting a crackling noise on my moto g5s plus. sometimes one side earphone stops sounding during a call. This works relatively good on PC.. Not recommended.

name: Neha
title: Good sound quality...
content: Recently bought this product, delivered on time and product quantity is nice...Easy to use.Sound quality is nice, worth the price...

name: Groot
title: Must try.
content: This is the second time am purchasing this product. First time was from Flipkart though. Really liked this mainly how they fit perfectly on your ear. Bass is superb and sound quality is really worth for this price tag.

name: Hemali Khushaldas
title: Disappointed
content: It's not even been a long time and I'm very careful with using my gadgets. But this useless product has stopped working already. Worst "Sound quality" and zero "noise cancellation". Wouldn't suggest purchasing this.

name: Biswajit Panjal
title: Normal quality
content: Did not find it of any better quality than normal product available at less than 100/- price.

name: Indrajit Goswami
title: Dependable....Within budget....Indian Brand

name: komalchaprana27

name: Bhriguraj Bordoloi
title: Best earphones at this price
content: I think the best quality product at this price.. 1. Superb sound quality. 2. Super bass. 3. Better noise cancellation. 4. Love the color as well. Looking for a earphone with mic at the best price, look no further. Get this.

name: Bhawna
title: The quality is not and lot of noise
content: I didnt like the product at all.You wont be able to talk on calls via these.The other person can only hear noise not your voice.I ordered this on 21st March 2020 the day before lockdown .I got it delivered on 17th may and amazon has closed the return window on 3rd of april 2020.So i have no option to return even

name: Thakur Sumit Tomar
title: I like this product So much üíûüíûüíû. His sound quality beat JBL sound quality.

Do yo like bass So you purchase this product . His build quality cheep but not to bad . I like this product So much .

name: shenolikar
title: Overall nice. Reasonable sturdy good sound not best,
content: Overall a nice buy. Sturdy. But should be used with respect. Don't pull them out of your ears by the chords. Reasonably nice sound quality. Not best.. Go for discounts.

name: deepak kumar
