Wires feels deluxe and good quality.

name: Ghostumour
title: Not a good product
content: I have been using these since 2 months. I don't like the sound comming out of it. Sounds like the 100 rupee earphones.. And the sharp frame behind the speakers poke my ear when watching youtube -sleeping on bed.. I have now fixed my old earphones and using them.

name: Sahil Dhingra
title: Worst product by boAt
content: I never write reviewes that much but i had to write it for this one. 70% of the time, there is no voice receieved on the other side of the phone. It is good only for music or pubg. For call purposes, it is a big NOOOOOOOOO

name: Amazon Customer
title: Add 100‚Çπ and go for other products
content: Am really shocked about product quality. I regret this purchase. I now understand with such a big investment on advertising how boat is managing to make money is by selling 40‚Çπ product with 20‚Çπ packing and selling for 400‚Çπ perfect. I honestly feel the earphones sold by vendors in train are of same quality both sound and product wise

name: Anonymous
title: Falsehood
content: If you like its warranty as I , pls don't buy it. I think its such a nuisance to buy this product and claim for warranty. They didn't help you at all

name: sohanpal Singh
title: Buying a Boat head phone was a big mistake
content: Worst product of boat, it was making just after 2 month of purchase, no online support of service center in covid19 pandemic. When I was visited boat service center found long queue of boat product buyers who has been facing problem with boat product. So go for other brand for head phone.

name: Dinesh kumar
title: See it buy it
content: The best headphone i have used so far. It is very durable and long lasting unless otherwise you lose it there wont be any other problems.. That warranty if you try to register in official website it may not work but i don't think its necessary since the product is that good.

name: Basha
title: Low Volume Headphone, Better Other One
content: Totally Very Low Quality Sound.. I was disappointed.. But Brand Original 'BOAT' .. I'm Return The Product.. Sound 100 % Phone Volume Low Sound On Boat Headphone, But Other Brand Headphone Very Loud Sound.

name: Nathan Pratyksh Khanna

content: This is one of the few products that gives you the best quality for the price it asks for. I am always critical about the sound, but surprisingly, this is really good. I would definitely recommend this.

name: PRAJAKTA
title: Great product
content: This is my second purchase within a year. The sound quality is quite good and the buds are quite soft and comfortable for long 'work from home' hours

name: NILESH
title: Warranty Issues
content: My headphone is not working last two months and I contacted amazone for replacement as it is within warranty period but Amazon is denying for providing service and request me to approach boat service center. If we purchase from Amazon why we rush anywhere else. Secondly during this lockdown it is very difficult to reach any service station even they are not receiving any calls.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Major problem
content: I purchased this product and within one month I started facing problem. The main problem is the volume gets muted automatically. Be it a YouTube video or music or a movie.... it gets muted automatically once I plug in this product. This the major issue

name: Aman
title: Awesome as always
content: I gave 4 stars for noise. Cancellation because there is no such item tha can eliminate noise completely. So as a Matter of fact...boat is one of the best ....and will always be...this is my 7th earphone....2 for me and I recommend my friends the same..üòâ

name: Falak
title: Could have been better.
content: The design of this earphones makes my ears hurt when i lie down. The bass is fine. Honestly for the price its fine. If you are thinking of getting these, don't. They are not comfortable at all. Thats my only complaint.

name: Trupti Gund
title: Faulty product, quality was dam bad
content: Headphones was faulty, mice was not working, and strongly felt that this headphone was duplicate.. I return the product.. Guy's please try to buy electric items directly from market

name: Venkatesh S
title: Average quality.
content: Average product. Keeps slipping out of the ear continuously. Sound quality is just average. What more can be expected at this price? Noise reduction zero! No noise reduction at all. For this price it is ok. Sound is reasonably good.

name: Siddharth Banerjee
title: Sound Quality And Build Quality both are satisfactory
content: The material type is good . The wire seems firm. The sound quality is good. The bass and treble both is more than satisfactory.. It is a great low budget buy.. Not sure about the durability but if at this price it goes for more than a year it will be more than enough

name: Prasad
title: Poor service life of only 3 months
content: The headphones stop delivering sound after usage of 3 months.I had bought two times and same issue I faced.Though sound quality is good but reliability is very bad.Its life is very short.

name: Kasturirangan
title: Value for money.
content: After a long search I got a satisfactory rarphone. Well suits the ears. Being aged I like this earphone as it has improved my hearing clarity. Microphone also reported clear quality by the listeners.

name: Jimmy Henriquez
title: Nice Bass...
content: Great In this Price Point but the bass is little boosted but u can adjust that in your streaming application, i like the built and design its beautiful and also the earphone is made in India...

name: A.Mohammed Musthakeem
title: Cheap and best
content: Loved this earphone very much. Better sound quality. Has decent amount of bass & treble than MI.. The main drawback is that the seal was broken and God knows if it is a used one.

name: krunal shah
title: Worst item
content: Please don't buy it totally low quality product sell by Amazon. After I buy in two months it's stop to work after I reach to boat customer care exchange they denied me and say it's not our product it's duplicate...... Great salute for Amazon if I give full price of product and didn't get original product then why should I buy from Amazon I think we should buy from street vendors

name: toran
title: Sound quality is superb

name: Malvi M.

(Got this at Rs. 350) I am using another headphone from Boat which is better than this but that is obvious as that product is of 255 bass where this one is of 100 only.. But this is a good product, no doubt in that. Will update later after using it for some days.

name: karishma rawat
title: Not so worth

There was some sound coming from inside thought of returning but unfortunately lost it the same day. 1 purchased 2 out of which black one is working well but this pink one was having some problem. As per the look frankly speaking they don't look OG and I don't find it worth. I found it too expensive as per the quality.

name: Rajani a

content: Its a gud product, only problem is length of individual wires. If you wear the headset from your back then they keep on falling back as they r bit short otherwise no issues

name: akh1l
title: The mic really needs to work better
content: Unlike other headsets this one has it's mic way down so inorder to use it you need to hold it up. So if you plan to use it for gaming it's going to be of no use.

name: Valisa Dabreo
title: Good

name: Dhruv
title: Super Sound
content: Blown away with the sound quality. Wasn't expecting such a fantastic and clear sound. Total bause for money. Would like to to try their other products too.

name: Anita R.
title: Good

I was not able to feel the bass effect though when I listen to music. It comes in funky colors and most importantly doesnt entangle.

name: Saumya
title: IT STOPPED WORKING WITHIN 15 DAYS OF USAGE

WHEN I TRIED TO RETURN THE PRODUCT IT SAYS 'YOUR RETURN WINDOW IS CLOSED ON JUNE 10TH' THAT IS 10 DAYS INTO BUYING THIS PRODUCT. WHAT IF IN MY SITUATION IT STOPS WORKING WITHIN 15 DAYS ???? I BETTER GET SOLUTION ON THIS AMAZON. SUCH A POOR SERVICE

name: Aparna R.

content: Only after 10days one side ear phone was not responding clear but boat is providing excellent service in warranty period.Boat replace my old product with new.Excellent .

name: Submit
title: Bad

name: Arjika S
title: Good earphones at affordable rate
content: The packaging was perfect. The delivery was before time. The earphone also has a warranty of 1 year. The sound quality is good. I've bought this product before as well. My experience has always been good. Loved it

name: vivek bahuguna
title: Inexpensive , quality product. Good purchase
content: I think this is best earphone in this range. Good base quality. I really like, my 2nd purchase within 6 months. Definately recommended for people who dont want to spend lot on expensive earphones.

name: Saaim Shaikh
title: Great at first! But stopped working very soon.

Ive been taking very good care of them amd there has been no incident of water ingress or stress on the cord. Would like to replace them as it has hardly been 2 months since the purchase.

name: Joby J.
title: Very clear sound and strong bass

name: Dilip Kumar

name: Amazon Customer

name: Satinder Arora
title: Not so Good

name: Roshan Mustafa

name: nadeem
title: Worst product

name: DILIP khatri
title: Nice one

name: Shiksha

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not up to the mark

name: Mohamed Mushraf K.B

name: Rahul
title: Best
content: Based on the very affordable price:. - build quality is excellent. - mike is excellent. - ear buds dont seem to hurt(havent used for long). - free carry pouch. - wire length is long(excellent for me). - nice wire strap to handle the length.. - 1 yr warranty. - 2 extra ear buds. All for 400INR is just great.

name: vishnu g
title: Good Earphone with fair price

name: Abhishek
title: Bad experience with the earphone
content: Issue with mic may arise.. Bad customer support. Its been 3 months since I bought these earphones and the mic of the earphone stopped working so I tried contacting customer care and even tried visiting one but the outlet was not there it had been shifted somewhere else and they had not updated on their website. Also you'll get no help from customer service number or e-mail.

name: Emrys Dias
title: The perfect headset within a grand.
content: This is one of the best headsets I've used. For the price quoted this can compete with a 1200 rupee headset. The base is good and the treble is balanced. There isn't an issue like most headsets where you have to adjust the equaliser for every song/genre change.

name: BISWAJEET NAYAK
title: Unreliable earphone and pathetic customer care service
content: Within 1 month, one side of earphone stopped working. Raised a replacement request but they rejected complaint saying invoice is invalid, though i gave downloaded invoice from Amazon site. And when i try to reach customer care, they are not approachable. Unreliable products and pathetic customer care service.

name: John P.
title: Above average quality ,best for those who want low pitch sound.
content: Like the quality of rubber,noise cancelling.. good for people who like low pitch sounds.. Dislike the fading colour on ear buds within 10 days.. Left right ears specification should be in another shade.

name: Francis Gabriel Gomes
title: Good product at a reasonable price
content: Its a good product with balanced sound. Depends on the buyers personal preference. If you are a bass lover only, then look for other options. If you prefer treble over bass with decent loudness, then its a safe buy.

name: Mohammad Saeed Hariri
title: Excellent Product
content: I was hesitant to buy this earphone from Boar. But when I received it the packaging and the quality was great. Even the sound quality is clear with all the beats. In the price range I find the product too good than expected.

name: Prince kumar
title: Genuine Review
content: Cons.. 1.Due to it's tilted design it hurts ears üëÇ seriously.. 2.Wire should be more strong.. 3.Bass - 4/5 Treble- 4.5/5 sound quality- 4.7/5. 4 Noise cancellation 2.9/5. 5. Button is hard to press.. Pros.. 1.Great at this price point. 2.Overall sound quality is good.. 3.Not tangy can be seen easily manageable

name: Shubhi
title: Thanks Amazon!
content: Thanks Amazon for super fast delivery!!!. The packaging was really nice, what attracted me most is they've provided 2 sets of earvsponges in case you lost them somewhere else & a very cute packet for keeping earphones. The sound quality is really good but I think the sound volume is lil less than the actual volume of the phone, otherwise everything is fine.

name: N Gupta
title: Good quality budget earphones
content: Third pair I have bought. Originly I had a pair which lasted over a year. Then repurchased 2 pairs for myself and my mother. We don't listen to loud music anyways so this serves our needs. Colors are true to photos.

name: Amazon customer
title: Not Bad at This Price Range
content: Within this price range it an OK product, it does not have good bass but yes it's quality is nice.. I have Sennheiser and Samsung Level U , and compared to them it's not upto the mark.. But if you are an average user, it will do.

name: Naveen Raj Singh
title: Bad CRM
content: I am trying to reach the boat customer support for discussing my warranty but their number is invalid and the customer support site is also not reachable, earphone wired is not working now I don't what is the use of giving a 1-year warranty when you can not assist your customer.

name: harsha.choragudi
title: at the given price, the quality is fair
content: The name says it all ...the sound quality is good but don't expect a digital bass type of experience. they are just normal earphones that come at a fair price.

name: Gokul
title: New user review
content: I was just using normal headphones which I used to change over every month then I just felt to give a try to boAt headphones and it didn't disappointed me...the sound quality comfort over headphones was so cool and you get earbuds additional and a mini bag to hold your headphones the way they deliver the product boAt was like 100%so don't think just go for these ‚úåÔ∏è

name: Rishav Roy
title: This Ear phone is awesome
content: I liked this product lot,higher rhan my expectations,perfect noise cancelation ,nice base and treble,mic is clear too,product material is good according to the prive,I bought it fromm 350 is discount,perfect budget headphone within 700,You should buy it .I hope You will like it.

name: Chaitanya Borkar
title: Har ek ko bass pasand hai...
content: At this price it's a best in class earphones. Bass is not like high end costly earphone but it will surely a good one. I am using with my One plus device and truely getting amazing experience on Amazon Prime music.

name: Katran
title: Mic Placement
content: Not bad for the price but for one major exception... The mic placement is highly unintuitive. It is near the chest so you will have talk louder or hold it physically near your mouth.

name: Vishal Singh
title: Sound output is amazing along with it's clear bass!
content: In terms of crisp clear sound quality and the bass is perfect. In terms of ear fitting, I won't say it's the best but after an hour, Your ears will start to hurt. It's not that comfortable in ear fitting, But I won't say it's the worst of all. It's great in it's class.

name: Jahan M
title: Good
content: Worth price . Good budget earphones when you urgently need one and dont care much about bass...noise cancellation. Pretty decent. But it does work. Good for price.

name: KP
title: Value for money
content: The product is value for money. It gives good quality sound. The bass effect and noise cancellation could have been a little bit better, but nothing to complain as such. Also I believe it is an Indian startup company so good to support the Make in India movement.

name: Prabha
title: Cheap product, no invoice, no warranty!
content: I choose this earphone because of warranty. It s not been 4 months and it stopped working. Need to download invoice..but m unable to..amazon saying contact seller and while contacting seller..there's some rob on other side. How can fix this earphone? Using these mobile phones and apps gives me headache..im not a tech savvy person!

name: Barbara Mawkhlieng
title: Decent for the price
content: Sound, bass, clarity decent enough for the price. But, looks cheap, mainly the plastic finish. Cable is long so it's hard to catch the Mic sometimes. Decent product.

name: aakash
title: Please resend r refund
content: Firstly I used this üëÇ ear phones from delivery then onwards left side earbud is not working properly, without sound, clarity when listining song's and talking in the phone,no bass is clear,sir am a farmer for after farming I listening music for mind relief, I don't have a money to rebuy,can you please resend this earphones r refund the money to rebuy

name: Elektra
title: I love it
content: I loved it. Everything is so clear and music feels good. I also use it to listen to my audiobooks. I use lower volume for it. Sound doesn't iritate my ear or anything. Overall I love it.

name: Justin david
title: Earphone with medium quality..expect more from BoAt
content: Sound quality is not up to mark...compared to Redmi it is less quality plastic...another feature..noise cancellation..not satisfactory...overall a medium quality earphone... expect more from BoAt

name: Greeny
title: Excellent ear phones - Budget friendly
content: At this price range, I didnt expect a lot out of the earphones with so many options around 500-600 range. If you are looking for budget earphones, no need to shell out additional 200 bucks.. These earphones have good bass range.. Noise cancellation is good..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for Money
content: Quite a steal, at their price. To me, their strongest point is that they fit my ears snugly, much better than any headphone I ever had that didn't make me look like Biggles the WWII pilot...

name: Bisakha
title: Boat earphones didn't even last a month. Please look into the matter
content: Bought this on 25th May and today is 24th June. It precisely didn't even last me a month. Bought Boat earphones with a lot of expectations but the product has stopped working. The one side doesn't work. I've been a loyal customer to Amazon yet got this kind of product which doesn't even last a month. I want you all to please see this and not buy. Highly disappointed. Please see this Amazon.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: Absolutely loved it. Very happy with this purchase. The sound quality is brilliant. Luckily, I bought it at a discounted price that makes me even more happy with this purchase. It came with a quite little pull string bag (see pic) to keep the earphones.

name: Arun
title: Good earphone in this price range
content: After using it for 3-4 months it still works very good... Pros. 1) light weight. 2) good noise cancellation. 3) bass quality is not that great but its okay in this price range. 4) earphone wires are very flexible and long. Cons. 1) built qaulity is not that much good which i expected it... 2) sound quality is okay. Conclusion. If you are looking for earphone of medium range price for calling and listening purpose it is good choice for you

name: neelam
title: sellers gives defective product
content: i am ordered this item thrice all time i received product very good condition and all quality was bestbut in this time i received this item is defective it is not working properly.so i m going to repalcement

name: Gaurav Goyanka
title: Good only to listen to music
content: Nice but not that efficient from MIC perspective. But just to listen to music it's good. MRP was 999/- which is damn higher side but got this in a good deal.

name: Vinay
title: Average
content: I purchased this product last week and needed a replacement since the end connector has loose connection. Unfortunately the replacement delivered also has the same issue but Iam keeping it. Sound quality is pretty average. A samsung earphobe that comes along with mobile is much better in quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of money
content: Within a week time one of the speaker not working and the 7 days return policy also expired. Sent mail and raised complaint in boat customer support but no reaponse

name: KARAN
title: Superb audio quality
content: For this amount of money, quality and sound is damm good. If you have usee sound magic headphones which cost around twice, they will give you same audio quality.. Durability depends and i will update after some handling within few weeks.

name: Aishwary Sinha
title: Name of the product misleads.
content: Because of the previous experience with the brand, I thought this product will also be amazing as the name suggests but after spending 399 on this is still bad as compared to my 150 local earbuds. Not thought this would happen. I think the higher price range headphone of this brand are better.

name: Shambojee
title: Worst product
content: Bought this for online class for my daughter. One side is not working suddenly now. Return period is also over. Bought this exactly a month ago.

name: Surya Jenson
title: Worth for money gaming|music
content: Awesome sound quality and better experience for this rate.Dont expect too much for this rate.Build in quality is nice. In Box: 2 headset buds. And some boat documents. Gaming:Not soo good at gaming but nice quality in splitting left and right. Music:Nice sound quality.. Good base. Clarity in sound. Overall worth product for this price range.

name: sana
title: But for that price its good
content: We can listen music nicely..but we use for calling...no sound only..for dis price this is good..but pouch is not good bcz earphons tier is stuck in that pouch cant easily take out

name: Amar
title: Okay earphone don't keep much expectations.
content: It's an okay earphone in past I've used Skullcandy and sony and compare to that it's nothing even in full voice it's normal not good for music i lost my previous earphones and had to buy these for temporary use finally got sony mdr xb55 which is awesome.

name: Anusha
title: Economically best one
content: I will give a 4.5star rating for this aftr using for 4months no complains just a economically best one from the market. I got dem as a spare earphone for my Bluetooth earphone since this lockdown my dad have been doing complete justice to them by using dem continuously. They were no complaints till now

name: Rajeev
title: Boat Rock ü§ò
content: What to say..!! I was searching for a good earphone and tried this.. A great & light-weight earphone.. Sound quality is very good.. Bass is superb.. Wire is delicate and needs to use carefully.. Only thing, which I found problematic is, the microphone should be in-line, which makes voice more clearer while on call.

name: Tejashree
title: Duplicate product & sound quality is bad
content: When I order this product for first time it was good but when I order this earphones 2nd time it was stopped working after 5 months only and 2nd time I ordered 2 pieces of earphones but sound quality was not good this time . I think it was duplicate earphones bcoz both the sets of headphones was stopped working after 5 months as well as the sound quality and products was not good as compare to first time.

name: Not a customer
title: Overview
content: Sound quality is pretty good. Low's are crisp and high's are great until you max the volume where it starts to break in certain high pitched notes. Build is decent, very light and the mic placement is poor. The mic quality in on the other hand is decent and the multi function button has a good feel to it. All mentioned functions besides the triple press for previous track works. Bass is low but very good considering the fact that these are earphones. Sturdy connecters, good design and the inclusion of 3 sizes of eartips make this a good buy. Will recommend only if price is below ‚Çπ350.

name: MADHUKAR
title: stopped working after 3 months of usage
content: i bought it for my daughter. she liked it very much bass is good and all. after 3 months one of the ear piece stopped working. after some time the second one too.

name: Sunitha Gokul
title: Decent one not best / noise cancellation is not working
content: Decent headphone for this price but noise cancellation is not effective, even minor back ground noise is picked up. Sometimes getting ear pain... The noise cancellation is not working at all, people can hear all the sounds around me very clearly...

name: Amazon Customer
title: value for money
content: - very good headphones for very less money. - comfortable for usage. - you can abuse this headphone. - durable. - can use for 1-2 hours at a stretch. - good bass/treble

name: Prabir
title: Not much comfortabe.
content: White colour is good. Due to sharp pointed at the end it is not comfortable to insert in the ear. Volume quality is not upto the mark in comparison to other model of same make. For quality audible sound I have to press volume button of my phone beyond permissible limit for an ear phone.

name: Avnish pandey
title: review
content: i have used same model ear phone for a year and half and after that that it got broken (in a fight :).. Then i re-ordered same model but this time button on ear phone is not working. Really sad because i was very satisfied with old ear phone.. ---- =. But y it if you want it to play pubg it is good for pubg.. There is 1 earphone by MI , that is also good but this ear phone is lightweight.

name: Neeraj Chandel
title: Best wired earphones under this price range!!!
content: Gifted these earphones to my mom and she absolutely loved them. Best earphone with premium quality look and sound. Go for it blindly if you are looking for a decent earphones with good sound quality+ amazing bass.

name: Vicky Mehta
title: Simple and efficient
content: Sound quality good. Bass quality cool. Noice cancellation good. It's good in price. Have used for 2 months still the same. Just to check it's durability only. And above all its nice pick

name: Arun Naidu
title: Wire cut
content: I've ordered 2 qty 1pc received in good condition and another 1 was broken and there is only right side earpod is working another was no sound because it was broken

name: Subho
title: Strongly Recommended!
content: Again I took ten days to write this review. The product quantity is great. The sound is amazing. Though the bass is a little low bit nevertheless you can control it with the settings of your phone, PC or laptop. It is again a pocket friendly product with great finish.

name: kritika(enchantcaptures)
title: Great product, great price.
content: The quality of the product looks great, sound quality and performance is very nice. Quite stylish also. Overall a great product because of the performance in this range.

name: Sandeep David
title: Crap
content: Stopped working within a month of use. Screws up my phone (POCOF1) sound system, resets the vOlume meter repeatedly while it's plugged in. Noise cancellation is non-existent and there are far better ones out there, for lesser price. Don't waste your time or money on this one.

name: Verified User
title: Terrible product with pathetic longevity
content: Its been less than 2 weeks and the mic has stopped working altogether. As soon as I insert it in my mobile jack, the media volume turns low. I was fooled by the high rating of this product, but it turned out to be worse than those 50rs. roadside earphones. I regret buying it..I dont know what to do now that the replacement window is closed too.

name: Saptasindhu
title: High on bass with poor microphone and voice quality
content: After using for 1.5 months, I can say that the product is good if you really like bass over all other aspects. The microphone is very poor, and sound quality is just average. For a balanced experience of music, this product is not recommended. However, this is pretty good if you only like bass. Overall a below average product.

name: Jigar Pardeshi
title: Nice product + great Amazon team
content: Best product at sucha low price also had some issue but it got replaced and now it's working really fine.. thanks Amazon team for replacement and your efforts.. Hardworking Amazon team

name: Prabhuram
title: Brand Name alone doesn't give the best
content: After month of using, headphone doesn't work with Samsung m31 mobile. Don't look the Brand name alone to buy the product. At the time of working also doesn't seem to best for the cost

name: Mahesh Ranmale
title: Cheap quality product
content: Used for 3-4 months and microphone stopped working. And after 5 months left ear speaker stopped working. Weast of money and very very cheap product with less than 6 months life expectancy. Do not fall in trap of "boat" brand name.

name: garima
title: Defective product, Look into the quality of Vendors
content: The ear phone that I received today was not working. The packaging can be seen in the pic that someone ordered it before and returned it, so they have taped the box from both the ends. It looked like used product to me. Amazon need to check the vendors and their quality. Didn't expect it from brand Boat either.

name: Anita
title: After using for a year.
content: I have been using this earphone for almost a year now and i haven't faced any problem with it.. Sound quality is perfect, bass is also good it doesn't do well in Noise cancellation but overall the product is Good.

name: Thulasi
title: Best price &Best quality &Best storage facility
content: Happy to share that qualities of base &mic &sound is excellent and also they give small bag to store that headset it is very excellent work.... Itis most welcome thing by the company Brand...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best for the Price
content: Most earphones don't last more than a year for me. So, instead of going for the best at a higher price, I chose these and I'm happy with my purchase. Read lots of reviews with replacements under warranty. So, would not mind if the product didn't last me 1 year. Bass is good for the price, which is not to my liking. Sound is good for the price.

name: Jagadeesan P
title: Satisfied but feeling bad
content: I am feeling very bad because i lost this headset.. Sound is perfect at low and mid volume but not good at high volumes- 4/5. Bass is not perfect but good enough-4/5. Wire is so good -5/5. Design and comfort is very good - 5/5. Mic works good but need to hold the mic near mouth during calls.. I reordered this headset after using two other headset. Will give a review for the second one also

name: srividya
title: THIS BOAT SHAPED EARPHONES IS TOO GOOD !
content: I like the unique shape of the earphones which prevents the earphones from frequent slipping. The sound quality is also good. The wires do not tangle with each other so it prevents cutting of wires. I feel the price could be brought down.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Reasonable good quality earphones
content: Very reasonable price for such a good quality product.. On time delivery.. Durable and tough build quality.. I used many earphones before, but when last year I bought this, I liked it very much, so again this year ordered the same model earphone.

name: P. Uttam Kumar
title: Not good
content: Noise cancellation is negligible.ourgoing voice not clear .not atall good .. After 11 month of use its one side not working , returned to company on 19/05/20, but after one month ,I have not received the replacement .

name: Binita
title: Earphones
content: Good buy..but pls ck size before purchase ..it turned out to be very small than wats shown in pic .however good for my kid ..sound quality and all other details is perfect.

name: SIBAJYOTI MUKHERJEE
title: A deal to go for
content: Brought the product on a 50%sale, making it a great deal. The product claims to have strong and sturdy wires but however doesn't seem to. Though the quality of the wires is much better it looks like they would break off by a not so strong pull. The product is literally the best in all other segments be it noise cancellation, bass or sound quality.

name: Ashlyn J.
title: Best in best price
content: The best pair of earphones with the best price. Complete noise cancellation. Great for outdoor use specially running or intense activities because of the extra grip outside the ear hole. Doesn't slip off from the ear frequently. Which a win for me.

name: sourav biswas
title: For the bass lover
content: Ok, i have used many earphones from many branded company, it's sound is good if u like bass in your music ..... I'm a bass lover .... From me it's good like jbl or sony or smile Jamaica .... Not the best but good at this price point, it's good for daily use .... Love the bass

name: Jahnavi
title: Mic stopped working after 2 months of use
content: If you're someone who uses headphones for calling and speaking then I definitely do not recommend these earphones. The mic quality is really bad and it got spoilt within two months of use.

name: Palash Debnath
title: Mind boggling product
content: I just blown away when i put in my earphone. It is just a superb one.It will give you goosebump when listening song. Just a amazing one.I just love it. Thank you Boat for providing this in such costs..Loads of Love to your company. Just a request dont run or walk while listening song cause noise cancellation is too good..

name: Sohag D.
title: Sounds good üëç, built quality üëé
content: If built quality is your one of your priorities then don't go for it, built quality is like 50 rs Chinese products. Expected a bit more at this price. Sounds well, bass well but while playing pubg it doesn't work good. In pubg you barely hear the enemies footsteps. Noise cancelling is not that great but not even too bad ü•¥. After all it's your call.

name: rahul singh
title: Dissappointed... Just worked for 2 months
content: Just worked for 2 months, and then one of the earbuds is not working.. I have sent the headphone to service center through their courier service.. Let's C when I get my replacement.. Dissappointed with the headphone though.

name: kapil pandey
title: Not recommended
content: Sound quality 5/5. Bass 4/5. Wire quality 2/5. Comfort 3/5. Noice cancellation 3/5. Phillips 1515 much batter then this boat100 at same price rang

name: Deety srinivas
title: If u want deep bass don't buy
content: Bass very very low but he is telling extra bass come s. But it is fake please don't buy if u want bass sounds. If u want High noise voice it will buy excellent

name: Saloni Gupta
title: Don't go with reviews.
content: I bought them after going through reviews, why the hell people are giving it good stars.. These are okok headphones, sounds like u are listening music in an auto rikshaw...better buy Mi one...these are pathetic....dont know why people are liking it.

name: K P Lama
title: Great earphones
content: I found it to be very good in terms of sound quality as well as noise cancelling action. Price point is also excellent. Great replacement for o.e.m. earphones.

name: suparno bhattacharya
title: Decent product for this price range
content: The review is done keeping in mind the price range. Wires well built, sound is pretty decent . Noise cancellation is good. Bass quality not that good (see that's funny..product name is Bassheads). I found a cheaper alternative to this which provides better bass quality. To sum it up, if you are not a person who is a super music enthusiast you can go for it. Hope it helps.

name: Rajesh Goud
title: Bad Sound quality.No bass at all
content: As per my view Sound quality is very bad..By spending this amount in local market you can get a excellent headset.there is no bass at all..if you have some knowledge then you can enhance only some bass in equalizer in your mobile..thats it..You can't do anything more than that.

name: Chirag G.
title: Amazing Earphones
content: The sound quality for this product is just amazing, better than all others. Boat surprises me with this quality in affordable prices another time. And trust me when I say that this product is just AWESOME cause I've tried earphones from almost all major brands, including JBL, Skull Candy and Sony.. But Boat is Value for Money and Surpasses them all.

name: Mohsin Ali Khan
title: Best for on the Goüëç
content: Rough n Tough, Better Quality built, carry along while travelling.Sound Quality is Good compared to my skull candy. Loved it as its quite cheap compared to other earphones & offcourse I love d Red Colourüòä

name: Naresh reddy
title: You'll feel the meaning of song.
content: Wonderful sound! It's been 5 months now, working great. Worthy!! Using with mobile phone for songs and meet for office work from PC. Well, bass quality is not that high, but for this price range it's a good quality.

name: Mr. Bhatt
title: Quality Brand Product With Awesome Experience.
content: Very satisfied with brand, good quality sounds, bass is awesome, value for money under this price. Quality is high, ear buds are comfortable, play pause functionality, microphone is also powerful. Overall a quality brand product.

name: Pavan
title: Keet it safe.  Enjoy in long-term
content: In the beginning it worked well but ,you wont see a great punch in the base. After 2-3months one side of the earphone was dead and it barely Colud survive for another few days, I suggest if you are a heavy user and do lot of physical activities while hearing then don't go for this product. Else for the price it's somewhat worth buying for a normal user though.

name: Sunil K.
title: Very Satisfied
content: Been using these headsets for the last 3 days and I must admit that I am quite impressed with the sound quality. The headset very light in the neck and has decent range too. Battery life also seems to be good. Overall a good heatset at this price that makes its totally VFM

name: jayanth sindhe
title: Super buy
content: Dear ppl. Let me be frank, because I am one among to return product to Amazon but this product is more then worth it 399 pls buy it with wired no other brand is so close to sound pure sound, noise cancellation not sure but songs like INDIAN, AR RAHMAN SOUNDS pure

name: Chirag Verma
title: Black beauty and sleek
content: Earphones are delivered exactly as they are portrayed in the image. Sound quality is good. I use it on Samsung M31(Dolby atmos) and Mi A2. Using it since 3 months with heavy usage and it still works good. Awesome product to have in wired category. It also has 2 pairs of extra buds for future use.

name: Mehul
title: Durable and good for regular use
content: It's been more than 5 months using this earphone, still no complaint. Everything is working fine. I wanted a earphone with mic and this is perfect. Very light weight and earbud fits well in the ear. You can use for longer time because it is light weight.

name: Sunny Saurabh
title: Good medium range earphone
content: As per it's price this product is good, I'm using this from last 1year daily. No issue came yet. Over all this ear phone is good. You can buy this if you are ok with price. But if you can spend more money go for BoAt BassHeads 220 super extra bass wired earphone.

name: Damthuilung Pamei
title: one of the best earphones at this range
content: I have been using for a 3 month now it works perfectly as brand new. Others earphones I used before won't last for 2 month but this one did it. Go for it of you are looking for a budget earphone. Got it in a lightning deal

name: Neeha Muneer
title: Don't buy
content: Sound is good. But these type of earphones doesn't fit in ur ears properly. Always it's falling down. There's no grip. It's totally uncomfortable. Please don't buy it. I wanted to return them but the date was over. So yeah go for some other product like Samsung, Vivo or MI.

name: Mukesh Dhiman
title: Not at all durable
content: I have used three of these earphones. The build quality of these earphones is poor. One side stops working after 2 - 3 months of use. These are typical cheap low quality Chinese made earphones which are not at all durable.

name: kunwar s.
title: Good to buy
content: Sound quality is just ok (No Bass), not at par with MI basic earphone, available at the equal price. But yes it comes with good build quality and 1 year warranty which MI doesn't offer. Bought because it is a Indian company.

name: Carlos
title: Good for movies n music
content: This is a very good product under this price range. Having said that, it is bit backwards when it comes to communication especially via Skype. Rest assured movies n music all good.

name: THAKUR YASHWANTH SINGH
title: It's really awesome
content: since I am using this product from few months I think I am quite eligible to give a review on it 1noise cancelling is very good at four out of five and 2 souy qualities awesome you will feel like you are in thater super Bass and all all good product at reasonable price you can purchase it if anybody interested in purchasing low budget headphones

name: joy
title: Review
content: Cheapest and best earphones available with good build quality.. sounds of the ear phones are good but there was no bass as in my case the bass was very low so if you are a bass heavy person these ear phones will not entertain you but if bass is not so important then you can go for them even for play battel Royal games these ear phones will work as a charm

name: Shaikh saif
title: NOT A QUALITY PRODUCT!!!
content: I have ordered this product twice, the first order delivered on 28th may and within a month I start facing issues in voice quality and than it stop working now on my second order delivered on 18th June the same thing happened,. The product is not good in terms of quality, sound clearity is average better to go for any other options but not this

name: Paramesh Kumar V
title: Its not worth it....
content: I expected that the product would be good since it comes from Boat. But this product disappointed me. The wire is too thin, filmsy and delicate. The sound quality is not up to the mark, particularly the Bass. This Boat product is not worth buying.......

name: Sumit G.
title: No Comparison With other,  you got if you like boat either not.
content: This Product has Extremely Sooooo Good i ever bought from amazon, so this was my out of imagination experience with boat team & amazon, that i was looking for value for money product which comes fairly true at this level i thought. No any wait, no any Comparison if anyone wants to buy, it is 100% green signal, go ahead & buy it & plug in to nirvana....üòáüòé i got what i want thanks boat... üö£

name: TAPAS KUMAR PRUSTY
title: Very nice boAt Bassheads 100 in Ear Wired Earphone
content: This earphone perfect for music listener. Bass is very nice. There is no noise cancellation while talking over phone during travel in bus, train or in bike. Voice is not very clear if you are moving and it is ok if you are seating and talking over phone. Overall it is a nice product. One love to use it.

name: Mahadyuti Saha
title: Not Operational after 2 months. BAYR (Buy at your risk)
content: I bouth this pair of earphone set on April and no surprises it has stopped working in June. So at your risk people. I guess this is why people shouldn't trust on any brands. Also I am not able to print my invoice using the mail I received from Amazon. The product is under 1 year warranty, hoping I will get a replacement soon. Can you please help me out to print the invoice @amazon

name: Amazon Customer

The pointed ends of the earplugs hurt my hands while inserting or readjusting. The earplugs itself are an uncomfortable fit and need to be readjusted every few minutes.

name: santosh kumari
title: Earphone replacement

name: Anurup
title: Mouthpiece too low.

name: sameer bawa

name: Abhishek Jain

I tried to reach out customer service for replacement but that is also very poor. Think 1000000000s time before buying as customer service very poor.

name: SWATHY SAthyan

Cheapest option for high quality music.. Boat has really upped it's product quality in India, recommended for range under Rs 500.

name: Rahul R Nair
title: Aftr 3 months usage the wire got damaged.Ordered these item 2 times same issue

name: Simra ansari
title: You should definitely buy these

name: asif
title: Not as expected

name: Reetuparna Dutta

name: Harshvardhan Walia

name: The Shopoholic

name: Sanjay Patnaik

name: Vivek Paradkar

name: Amazon Customer

While the product says it has a warranty of one year it's all just a hoax and there is absolutely no certainty that the product will work or be replaced or fixed.

name: N
title: Good

name: PAVAN HEMANTH NAMBURI

name: Prakash Daga

name: customer

Unfortunately there aren't any good options at this price range. Go for these only if you cannot spend any penny more than this, else try to spend more and buy some better.

name: naaz
title: good

name: Suresh

name: Sreekanth Nair

name: Dr Abhishek Chakrawarti

name: Anvesh

name: Suman Shaw

name: Rajiv

name: Anuj

name: gowri
title: Low quality product with less durability

name: Joydeep Roy Choudhury

name: Kavita Raichura
title: NA

name: V L

name: Shreya

name: chiranshu Kataria

name: Mandar Kulkarni

name: rahul kumar ravi

name: Anuradha

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pretty good

name: Amazon Customer

name: Sushmita

name: Suraj
title: Best Earphone

name: Kaleb

name: sai sindhu
title: Not as expected...

name: Sonam

name: Amazon Customer

name: sunny

Just a complaint on their site and they picked up the old one and replaced it with a brand new product. This process took 20 days (may be delayed due to the pandemic). I am satisfied with this one.

name: Kanishk agarwal

name: sibi

name: Aditya

It's been almost a year since I bought these and they still work as good as ever..... considering the fact that they were washed up twice in the washing machine üòÖüòÖüòÖ. ( Forget to take them out üôè). So yeah ... I would absolutely recommend these to everyone looking for a good sturdy earphones under 500.

name: Nirakar Panda
title: Non durable product

name: Amazon Customer

name: Tijo Antony

name: Brighty Marina Reji

name: rahul

name: Amazon Customer

name: Abhiram Ghosh

name: parthiv

name: Kevin Shah

name: Dipto K.
title: in budget but stopped working in 15 days
content: Edit: (27/07/2020) it's one side completely not working... Wasted my money... Don't buy.... Really disappointed.... Delivered today..(10/07/2020). Awesome sound quality.... name: Pratik

name: saumya singh
title: Complain about the boat earphones purchased on august this year

Priyanka singh

name: Ruku

name: Apoorv Mishra

name: Umesh J.Kumar

name: CSR

The price of this headset in both amazon and in Flipkart is the same only.

name: Abhi

name: Anil Kumar

Doesn't falls off easily (which I am impressed with). Noise cancellation is decent too

name: Apoorv Sathish
title: Worth buying.

name: Masood khan
title: Received defective product and after opting replacement service till now haven't got my product.

They almost takes 17 days to process with replacement and on Amazon app its showing me as delivered but till now I haven't got my product.. I had contacted to third party courier tie up of amazon but they are useless.. Really disappointing.

name: Prince W
title: Sounds Good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one

name: Heena sindhal
title: Nice üëç

Mike should be on one side because in middle side it create disturbance while driving or doing other work.. the calling is not good while working.. Boat has copied mi earphones but MI AND MIVI is good choice if you want buy earphones in these range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very affordable earphones
content: This is the best earphones in the market in such a cheap price. My older ones in white started giving problem after two years so I ordered another in red. Very happy.

name: Precious P Thomas
title: Good

name: Umesh Panchal
title: I got this for 427‚Çπ. I love this product at this price

But overall good sound and bass. I love this product at this price. And Amazon service also great & fast.

name: basudev kar
title: Good one
content: Bass is less but sound quality is good . you have to tingle with your device equilizer for getting a perfect output...high pitch sounds are little tinny,and build quality is good in this price range,Mike could be in higher position like mi basic headsets.

name: Tufel Tamboli
title: Value for money
content: Sound quality is really good. But durability is not that good. But there is manufacturer warranty if there is any quality regarding problem we can get new set of earphone from Boat

name: Ramzan Banu
title: Boat product never failed üëçüëçüëç
content: This product looks very unique and it's sounds very louder to me.... especially during conversation with phone call it's make me crystal clear sound and voice was very clear... another main thing is this product warranty is one year way better than any other products... value for money!!!!üëçüëçüëç

name: Amazon Customer
title: PROS & CONS
content: Using it for couple of months now. Below given is my review about the product.. PROS :. - cheap. - The sound quality is really impressive.. - clear phone calls. - beautiful design. CONS :. - it does fit properly in my ears and keeps falling off and hence the 4 star rating

name: Bijoyendra Sharma

name: Amazon Customer

Earphones have a quite long length. Also, package comes with earphones, extra buds, warranty card and a earphones strap band.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Works for 6 or 8 months

But what I observed in all the earphones common is they will work for not morethan 6 or 8 months..but sound quality everything is good.. but durability is not more than 6 or 8 months

name: Pam
title: Will update after a month..
content: I will give a proper feedback after using it for 1 or 2 months.. The rating is based on the quality check I did now, after receiving the product which I felt is good üòä

name: Krushi
title: Nice and worth the price
content: Execellent product for such a low price.. I bought it for 250 and its working very fine.. But noise cancellation is worst but you wont expect such a great noise cancellation at this price üòÇ

name: Sourabh Patil
title: Worth buying it at Rs. 349/-
content: Deliveres all highs and lows.. Good sound quality.. Comfortable in ears.. Good design, built quality and packaging.. Included warranty card and extra two pairs of rubber seals in package.. One thing, Bass could have been bit more.. Thanks to Amazon for early delivery though it was COD.

name: LOKESH THIMMANA
title: Warranty doesn't Works üò°üíî
content: With in One month one ear phone is not worked..They are not accepting Warrenty and even I unable to create an account in boat by using this product üò°üò°. So don't think about Warranty

name: ARPIT

The packaging was good and note worthing point was that they give a holder to keep the earphones intangible. It won't cost even 5 rupee, but it's great that someone is caring about the product durability.

name: Gokul
title: Only last for a year

name: AD
title: Average sound quality

name: Satheesh Kumar
title: Worth for money
content: The sound quality noise cancellation and bass quality all are good... Best one in this budget... But if you compare with some high end models (<‚Çπ999) it gives less bass quality otherwise good one go for it... One year genuine product warranty gives you a hope for long lasting purpose...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working within 3 months and no costumer service response
content: It has stopped working within 3-4 months (still in warranty period) and all the costumer care numbers are not responding to my complaint. Even I have registered complaint on their official website still there is no response from the manufacture. So dissatisfied with the service and product. They need to review their costumer back up services and product quality

name: Uday

I'm ok with that but this might not be what ure looking for.

name: LALAN K.
title: Booooooom booooooom

name: Manju

name: Utkarsha Advani

name: Ab Manan

name: Karthikeyan R
title: Average quality considering the price

name: mohammed atif akbar
title: Best Buy with Best service
content: I loved it .. as it came along with carry case n extra caps n warranty of one year .It was slightly damaged but they replaced it with new one in fastest service yesterday evening i complained today morning 10am I got it.. üòä thanks

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not bad for this price point

name: Melissa

name: Aditi

name: Nishant

name: durvesh

name: sanjeev kumar

name: sanjay dabral

But the play/pause button doesnt work, i have opted for replacement of the product thinking that the first ear phones have issue, but the replaced ear phones also dont support play/pause option. Let me know how can the company solve this problem, if this problem is not addressed, then i wouldn‚Äôt recommend any user to purchase this.

name: Anustup

name: Priyanka diwan

name: Akanksha

name: Aneesh N.

name: Vaishnavi B

name: Sanjay Singh

name: Bijeta Mishra

name: Shweta

name: Pravin S N

name: Hazem

name: Vaseem sheikh

name: vaishakhi b.

I tried changing my sound equalizers as well but nothing really helped. Will be returning this most probably.

name: Soumyadip Biswas

name: Ratan Rajesh Mogalapu

name: Frosektn

name: Sajid

name: Mayur Hedau
title: Best Headphones under Rs. 500

But yes at this cost you can't expect too much. So this is the best product under rs. 500.. I have used it for 11 months in a very rough because of that right headphone stopped. But if you'll use them with a little bit of care then they are durable too.

name: Abhishek Dixit
title: Disappointing
content: So many disappointing reviews from my colleagues, currently fighting for replacement of 3 products. In my product left speaker keeps giving sounds of loose screw/part inside, even after replacement. It seems boat is throwing away garbage through online selling, that's why it's faulty even after one replacement. Now even I'm ashamed in returning a product twice, don't know when boat will be ashamed...

name: Debraj Das

And stop expecting 100% noise cancellation from low cost products like these.. BOAT 100 Hawk was worth the but.

name: Vikram Sharma
title: Bad bad product

Save your money and order any other brand. Hopeless.

name: Shudhanshu Khanna

name: Jayaditya Dey
title: OK for the price
content: Can't expect much at this price. Bought it for my father who only needed one to make calls. Serves him well. However, I don't expect it to last long. Wires are flimsy. The build is the only problem. Stereo isolation is fine. So is the sound and base quality.

name: Karishma
title: Do not buy. Waste of money.
content: Do not buy the product. Instead add more money and go for a better brand. This is the second earpiece in one month that I'm changing. I'm not sure if this is the original product or a fake one. I ve used boat earpiece before too but for a very long time. It doesn't support the sound quality.

name: srikar
title: Awesome earphones in this price
content: Hi. I'm writing this review after 2 months of usage. These are worth buying and working great at this price range. Also, Boat is one of the trusted brand where user will get the replacement of the piece even the last day of warranty expiration. Buy it and enjoy your music.....

name: Kav
title: Nice headset
content: Nice head fone. If your sound quality have HD quality. You can feel very good experience headfone. Now days same song hear in different format sound. HD is clear quality

name: sunil k.
title: Good product at this price
content: Firstly I received a damaged piece. But I got it replaced from Amazon with in 3 days. So every one check the product working condition first.. Coming to the product it was great. The vocals and brass is as required. Even at the half volume of my mobile I can feel like full volume and while listening you will forget the surroundings... You can go for it it is a best product at this price range

name: Mr Nitin Kadam
title: Excellent quality made in India product with value for money.
content: This is the second purchase of the same product. The material quality is very good and hence will last a long time. Sound quality is as per my expectation. Overall a excellent product and being made in India adds more points to it.

name: suvarna
title: Just awsome... Unbeatable..
content: pink looks too good.. I have 3 boat earphones.. All are exllelnt... I m a boat fan.. As its quality can be trusted

name: Khadri
title: Excellent Quality
content: Overall product is good, Sound Quality, Noise Cancellation and Bass Quality is super, I have recommend this product to my friends

name: your trusty reviewer
title: Good but not great
content: Everything is good in this earphones but two things missing in the earphones is durability and the fitting in the ear. other than that if you have small ears and if you handle things really well means just go for it. one of the best brand in the platform.

name: Shalabh Sharma
title: Nice product....
content: Nice product for the price. Bought it at 349/- in sale. Don't expect too much but gives enough bass and sound to enjoy the music. This is my first product of Boat and feels somewhat satisfied.

name: rahul
title: Best quality
content: Superbb product...highly recommend..best sound quality...loved it ....bass quality also nice ...best headphones ever below 500 range..worth of cost....thank you very much

name: Jayesh
title: 0 Bass

name: Abijith
title: Good in this range
content: I haven't thought about this before , this gave me a good bass . This is a decent headphone in this range . Built is good . I had experienced a problem , which is a high sound on one side and low side on other side .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product.
content: If you are a BASS lover don't go for the product. Otherwise you can go for it. I want earphones for picking up the call, so it serve my purpose.

name: Bobby
title: Product not for real music lovers
content: Volume too low. No enhancement. No noise cancellation either. Another cheap product no use other than talking.

name: Vikram Sharma
title: Good clear sound but  bass at all.

They are misleading by menrioning extraaaaaaa bass earphone on their box.. Sound clarity is there, brand name us tyere, design is good but no bass at all.

name: Kestrel
title: An interesting title
content: A basic headset which does its job.. There is no noise cancellation nor is it a good choice if you are working out.. But for the price it is offered at, I say that it is a must try.

name: T Riddhi
title: Definitely go for it!! Great quality

name: Nidhi rawat
title: its a good product but not comfortable

name: shantha
title: What is nice.
content: I realy like this but for the improvements, in each ear peice you can write left or right,but thats not a problen ,the sound quality was very nice ,sound controls , totaly i love this "boat earphones the best"

name: Ayush Arora

name: Avaneeth_K
title: Sounds Awesome But Not That Durable

title: one earbud is gone.

name: Bhavik Bhan
title: Good Earphones

name: Rima_K
title: Nice quality üëå

name: Suraj Shrivastav
title: Better quality with gd price.

name: VENKATA RAO PATNALA
title: Not sure about its warranty either it is 6 months or 1 year

name: K S Saketh
title: Good earphones
content: At starting the bass used to be descent, but now a days the quality of bass is good but too much of bass is present which is not at all good for our ears

name: Aditya Upreti
title: Doesn't wreck!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality issue

They sell it with one year warranty but there is no way you can claim warranty if you buy online .... Hope they come up with warranty claim option here which is easier to use...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Working well
content: I've been using it for a few months and it's been working well with no issues. I does get slightly uncomfortable if worn for extended periods of time but I'm not too bothered by it.

name: Amazon Customer

content: Bass is pathetic and hence cannot enjoy music. feel like upgraded version of MONO sound(Remember old days) . They should design properly to deliver better experience to user.

name: Anu sabin
title: Disappointed
content: Had been using the same headphone for like an year and when that got complained, I bought this one. And this one doesnt have the sound quality as the former one. And at times I have to speak a lot more loudly during phone calls. Not happy with this one

name: Pooja mundra
title: Good earphone

name: Amit Ranjan

content: Overall decent sound and build quality, with the low price,with 1 year warranty.. Major issues are:-. 1. Low on BASS.. 2. Mic is at the joint, which means you have to keep it near the mouth with hand to have loud and clear voice on the other end. Nowadays most earphones have mic on one of the wires of earbuds.

name: Sumitra Sahu
title: Worth buying
content: Best product.... Almost destroyed 3 local earphones while listening music at night N sleeping like that only.... Bt now I hv boat earphones... N works quite well.... Even though using in the same way...üòÖ So plz don't waste ur valuable money on those - ‚Çπ100-120 local earphones... N spend lil more on these....

name: Praveen Sharma
title: Decent Headphone on such a low price

Just go for it guys...I tried MI and multiple headphones over few months time, but this stands out.. I have used it since a week now...and the response is more than expected.

name: Amritha K P
title: Please Note this b4 buying

name: SHUBHASHISH SENGUPTA

name: Amazon Customer

name: Ungli

name: Parvez Alam
title: Buy boat bass 225

name: Amazon User

name: Shruti
title: Nice..

name: Nigel
title: Top class for this price

name: bhuwna

name: Sumathi

name: Aks
title: Amazing.
content: No doubt boAt is producing some of the very good quality products. this one is a third product from boAt that i have purchased. Very good quality, looks are also very good.

name: Akshay
title: Good earphones in basic price
content: Sound quality is good and very clean. Properly fits in ears. If you have bass lover, I don't recommend it. Build quality is also better. The package gives all basic things that we need. Overall go for it for normal use.

name: Ajay
title: Good earphone

It got good sound quality , good noise cancellation and all the reliable features required for a good earphone.. After using for 2 months one side started showing trouble. There is loss of sound on the right side till it was functional it was good

name: Sanjusha
title: Good sound quality
content: As always, though boAt headphones are ome of the best ones in the affordable category, they lack proper fitting. Changing the buds is also a bit tedious. Overall, the quality is awesome as long as they stay in your ear and don't fall out.

name: Rp
title: Super awesome

name: Kishore Lala

name: Ashish r.
title: Nice one

name: Vimal B.

Overall, the headphone works great. Definitely a recommendation.

name: Susila Suresh Kumar

name: nagaprasad

The bass quality is literally low if compared to earphones like Boat 225. The sound quality is not as good as Boat 225. Lookig at the price point, it is worth it's price.

name: Vijaya
title: Good product

name: Raheem
title: Great service
content: Ordered it but received a damaged piece and I kept a return order and got a new one. Their services is really good. Received the new earphones within 2 days. And the product is Amazing really works the best. So it's one of the affordable and best earphones in my opinion.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Superb product
content: We feel like too much bass sound. But it's a very good headphone at low cost. Especially songs can be enjoyed with a good bass sound. Buy it if it comes below Rs600 or 500

name: Rawsome vlogger nd blogger
title: Good product

name: Prashant

name: Syed

name: Nithin Shetty
title: Not durable - sound quality is good

name: Sajal H.
title: Poor physical product quality

name: Vs
title: Quality is good

name: N.Satwik
title: Durable
